name: Variable Chaser Valchase
description:
Conglomerates struggle against each other to gain the right to develop the outer space.

Valchase, the latest model of chaser, flies a mission to get back the stolen classified information.

name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible III - Mugen no Eiyuu
description: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible III: Mugen no Eiyuu is a Japan exclusive RPG developed by Atlus and Menue for mobile phones.

name: Light of the Stars
description:
'Our World’ came to life with the Star Force, but the endless wars dragged it down into the darkness and chaos.
God decided to reset and recreate the world as he couldn’t tolerate it anymore.
Meanwhile, a great war on the land ended. After the war, the Elf Queen sought to acquire God’s Force.
In the process, she unsealed the ‘Early Water.’ It turned into a disaster. The world was flooded with chaos in no time.

name: Hexen: Veil of Darkness
description: Hexen: Veil of Darkness is an eight-level hub-based mod for Hexen designed for the GZDoom source port, created by Captain Toenail.

name: Dangerous Pacche-san Moriya's Journey 4
description: The latest installment in the Moriya's Journey series! The action game is back, kinder and worse! Can you solve the hidden mystery?

name: Tetsudou-ou Neo
description: Sin descripción

name: 1-jikan de Wakaru Kabushiki Toushi
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Star
description:
On a snowy night, a witch loses her way home and meets someone new.

Work together as a witch and her cat from space to overcome obstacles and find a way home in this challenging single-player platformer. Summon your familiar and swap places with it to reach new heights, use your broom to soar across chasms, and combine the two for acrobatic action and puzzle solving.

Includes adjustable gameplay speed. Slow things down if you want more time to think with each jump, or speed it up for an extra-fast-paced challenge.

name: Ad Lib Ouji ...to Fuyukai na Nakama-tachi!?
description: Sin descripción

name: ZomboidGuessr
description: ZomboidGuessr is a browser game inspired by the popular GeoGuessr game. The player is shown various screenshot from the game Project Zomboid and has to find the locations on the game's map.

name: Clothes Line
description: Clothes Line is a comical adventure game about chosen solitude. You will have to face the worst of your fears: a new neighbour.

name: Pooool
description: Pooool is a small, pool-inspired physics puzzler where you combine balls of similar sizes to create even bigger ones, all while trying to save room for more. Chase your hi-score, share scores with friends, and master your flinging skills!

name: Ben 10 Omniverse: Rise of Heroes
description: Ben 10 Omniverse: Rise of Heroes was a Ben 10 online game. It was a MMORPG.

name: Beneath our Scars
description:
This game takes place in a private clinic and depicts the blooming love story between Melinda and Rowan.

Your choices matter and will allow you to build and help their relationship evolve. Make the best decisions to unlock illustrations during the story!

name: Uncutetifying Danny
description: Your cute best friend, Danny, is sick of being called cute, so he needs your help to make him look cool! Your advice is important to him, so he'll change his appearance based on what you say. Will you be able to successfully turn him uncute?

name: Tetris Pop
description: 'Tetris Pop' is a game for J2ME mobile devices. The game consists of several minigames ("Mini-Variations") where the player must fulfill an objective in limited time. This game has cascade gravity in all game modes (even in Vanilla) and long ARE between pieces. A few minigames were later re-included in Tetris (PSP Mini) and Tetris (PS3).

name: With Love Comes Regret
description: A psychological horror girls love visual novel about two girls bonding over their overbearing parents and trying to live freely. But one of the girls seems to be haunted by the ghost of her own mother.

name: Befriending the Scarily Cute Fisherman
description: A 21-year-old who just wants to have fun and enjoy his youth, and a 31-year-old who's trying to get by and sell fishes for a living. The only thing they have in common is that they're awkward around each other.

name: We're Closed Sorry
description:
We're closed Sorry is a metroidvania in which the player controls both a titular hero traversing the interior of a retro supermarket store and the owner of the store. Immerse in an action-adventure combating bugs, finding secrets, and becoming a dreamt hero.

As the owner of the store, the game only begins when you close your shop allowing all creepy things and bugs to lurk in the dark terrorizing the store and your products.

name: Tower of Hermes
description: Sin descripción

name: Tortuga City
description: Survive Tortuga City as a wanted turtle. Defend yourself against the police, build a rebellion, endure dynamic weather, and find an escape route within 50 days before the police deploy their secret weapon.

name: PC Calcio 7.0
description: Managerial football game highly appreciated in the 90s created by Dinamic Multimedia srl and sponsored by the Italian Footballers' Association AIC

name: The Bird and the Bicycle
description: How far will you go? Take a roadtrip along peaceful country roads, as you fly through an ever changing sky, in this cosy, atmospheric, arcade game, with a retro aesthetic and soundtrack to match.

name: Don't Dig Up the Dead
description: You must find 3 magic relics to help rid the land of evil. Use the Find-O-Meter and your trusty shovel to search the forest. But if you dig up the dead you'll need to fight them off to stay alive, so pay attention to everything you unearth...it might just save your life.

name: Lab Cat
description: A sokoban game with portals and a cat

name: Bun Bun Samurai
description: A fast-paced arcade brawler, centered on scoring combos by knocking enemies into each other.

name: Welcome to Bulletheck
description:
Welcome To BulletHeck is a small rougelike game focused on randomized items and conserving energy. Energy is consumed by both shooting and sprinting and running out will cause the player to slow down for a short time. New guns and items can be discovered as you progress as well as stat upgrades that can be bought from shops.

The only objective is to reach floor 10 and fight the boss.

name: Porter
description: In Porter, you play as Yug who may teleport and jump. If Yug teleports into a wall, Yug dies. If Yug jumps into spikes, Yug dies. The goal is to use Yugs teleportation and jump to get to the yellow coin in each level.

name: Iberia
description: A Multi-User Dungeon, or MUD, is a text-based online multiplayer game where players navigate virtual worlds, interact with each other, and engage in various activities using textual commands. In the realm of Iberia, players are transported back to a pivotal period in history, set against the backdrop of the Roman conquest of the Iberian Peninsula.

name: A Better Schlo Dating Simulation
description:
Have you ever wondered what a schlo dating simulation would be like if it was better? Find out by playing a better schlo dating simulation!

Help Oran get a boyfriend in a short, fun dating sim that doesn't even need a trigger warning! (There is slight mention of "adult" things, but nothing too dark!) With 12 different endings, the game should be a good hour worth of fun!

name: Schlo: Final Stand
description:
The next installment of the Schlo series, Schlo: Final Stand, makes its final, full release, as a kinetic visual novel. Follow T. Chlroid, an insecure genetically engineered human, as he struggles in an attempt to turn his cherished friendship with an important public figure into something else.

Featuring characters seen in "what is schlo?" and "a better schlo dating simulation", it could also serve as a standalone project. It is technically a sequel to "what is schlo?", while the later parts would take place at the same time as "a better schlo dating simulation".

name: Rara Magic
description:
Raramagi is a mobile action RPG game where players can battle against monsters with cute school girls. By proceeding further into the story, players can develop stronger bonds with the girls. The game's animation is produced by A-1 pictures with Live2D technology and all girls are voiced over by famous CVs. Enjoy your school life with lively cute girls together!

The main storyline is fully voiced, with Live2D animation and anime-style stills of the heroines. The main story is divided into one act per heroine, and by the end of the service, the 14th act had been distributed. The heroines can be interacted with on the home screen, and interaction elements such as the "Outing" function, which allows users to take pictures with the heroines using an AR camera, and to increase their "Kizuna Lv" by giving them gifts.

The project was announced at the Nico Nico Ultra Conference 2015 on April 25, 2015. It then underwent a closed beta test conducted from October 20 to October 26, 2016 and was released as an iOS/Android game app on January 25, 2017. The pre-registration that began on December 22, 2016, attracted over 150,000 people, and after distribution, the game received 1 million downloads on March 9, 2017, and one year later, on March 9, 2018, it surpassed 2 million downloads.

The end of the service was announced on April 3, 2020, and the service was terminated on June 3 of the same year.

name: Schlo Pink and Purple
description:
Help Leila Crestcoft, a straight guy living in a culture of genetically engineered gay men, find a boyfriend to prove a point while simultaneously fooling members of an exclusive group that he is one of them.

The fifth installment of the schlo series is a dating sim rather independent from the rest of the schlo timeline, featuring many new characters as well as familiar ones. It could technically take place around the end of Schlo: Final Stand.

The focus of the game is on the Great Twelve descendants, a special group of humans living with the schlos. With 13 endings and a variety of antics sprinkled into a dating sim setting, the game should be at least a couple hours of fun.

The music was done by strawberry peeler.

name: Schlo Complications
description:
Follow Drey Gan as his life gets more complicated while living with schlos in schlo complications (part 1 out of 4), an HTML5 kinetic visual novel being released in four parts.

Drey Gan moves into a new house with the Clerences: Slate, Rain, and Shy, and his ex-boyfriend, Jake. Between missing his old relationship with Slate and secretly getting involved with Rain, things start getting complicated!

name: Big Tall Small
description: Big Tall Small is an adventure puzzle platformer game that was developed by rob1221 and released on November 1, 2020. It can be found on many websites stuch as Newgrounds and Coolmath games.

name: Mohrta
description: Mohrta is a nonlinear FPS game blending action, exploration, and light dungeon crawling. Explore a vast selection of unique environments, slay an enormous cast of otherworldly creatures, and upgrade your arsenal of multifaceted weapons.

name: Pirates
description: An arcade cabal-shooter centered around 16th century adventurers searching for lost treasure. Scour the islands of La Isabea, Papeete, and Shetland while battling against enemy pirates, tanks made of bricks, and Aztec natives.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Kamen Genei Satsujin Jiken Introduction
description: A game originally released as a free promotion for the DS version of Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 1 - Kamen Gensou Satsujin Jiken. This is not just a cut-out and delivery of the beginning of the game for mobile phones, but a new work that depicts the occurrence of the central event of the game from another angle.

name: Snails
description:
Do you have what it takes to withstand the malevolent hordes of oversized mutants infesting your community?

And more importantly, do you have what it takes to relive the 90's all over again?

Play and find out!

name: Psychic Shadows
description: Unpleasant dreams await you in Psychic Shadows, an independent video game made in RPG Maker VX Ace where every decision matters.

name: Tenchi wo Kurau
description: Despite many sources claiming that Tenchi wo Kurau for Game Boy is a port of the NES original, it’s actually a totally new game. It’s not even developed by Capcom, but instead Sun L, the developer responsible for the Game Boy ports of Gargoyle’s Quest II and Street Fighter II. Tenchi wo Kurau follows a similar storyline to the previous entries, but reshuffles things in interesting ways. Rather than starting with Zhang Fei, Liu Bei, and Guan Ye’s blood oath, you begin only as Liu Bei. The initial hour of gameplay involves finding his companions, joining up with the army, and destroying the Yellow Turbans.

name: Jikuu Senki Mu
description: There used to be a continent called "Mu Continent", which was ruled by the king of the country called Prina. King Lars II suddenly turned the state religion of Neil into the evil religion of Max. Shortly after the Neil people were ousted from the sanctuary, the Queen of Purina suddenly disappeared. In addition, the newborn son of the king was taken away by someone. After the conversion, monsters began to appear in various parts of the continent. People began rumors that the people of Neil were manipulating monsters. It's been 16 years since then. The demons, who continued to grow in power, finally invaded Purina Castle. The seriously injured king runs to the remote village "Eribe".

name: Golden Apple
description: You have to find the legendary Golden Apple among other treasures.

name: Ground Zero
description: After waking up you learn from TV that the world is on the brink of nuclear war. You start preparing for the worst...

name: Eye of Bain
description: You search for the Eye of Bain - a sacred emerald.

name: Mathshot
description:
Learn Add, Subtract, Multiply & Divide. Increase your brain power with an excellent educational game for learning mathmatics for children and adults of all ages.
Improve your math thinking and coordination quickly and fun with Math Shot.

name: Leo The Lost Kitten
description: Help Leo escape all monsters and find his way back home to his owner after getting lost.

name: SnapShot
description: A game about shooting characters for points but you need to avoid killing the wrong people.

name: Silver Thread: Deux
description:
Do ghosts actually exist?

In this sequel to Silver Thread, an exorcist that doubts the existence of ghosts might sound contradictory, but to Alicia Wilkershire, this is the right way to get closer to the truth. After hearing rumors of a haunted theater, Alicia was hired to investigate...but what will she find there?

name: BulletGBA
description: A homebrew bullet hell simulator for GameBoy Advance.

name: Swordsman on the Eternal Journey
description:
Let's go on a journey to break the lewd demonization curse placed on the main character, Mr. Swordsman.

A swordsman who was a soldier in the royal capital on the northern continent, but was cursed by the "Demon Lord," a powerful demon, to become a lewd demon. During his wandering journey, he received a blessing from the spirit of the fountain and was able to control the curse to some extent. In order to completely break the curse, he sets out on a journey.

name: It's Either Them Or Us
description:
But lately all the roots from your garden have grown,
They cut through my skin, they broke my heart
and all I have left are bones.

name: Can Do!
description: A cozy(ish) game about sorting and stocking grocery store shelves.

name: Future Cat Sailor
description: Play as the intrepid Future Cat, on a quest for wealth with which to feed his family. Boat and Platform around the haunting ruins of civilizations past. But will he be able to escape with his life!?!?!

name: Traintracks Combat
description: Traintracks Combat is a fighting game set on the Chicago CTA. Choose your commuter and duke it out at the California blue line stop.

name: After a While
description: Sin descripción

name: One More Encounter
description:
On November 17, 1992, a small group of three developers released a video game like no other. Only available for the NEC PC-9801 computer, this was the most ambitious game the industry had ever conceived. Unfortunately, it was a sales failure and was lost in the abyss of time.

More than 30 years later, One More Encounter (a.k.a OME) has been partially revived. One More Encounter was a dungeon crawler where the important thing was not the motif, but the journey itself and the characters we encountered along the way. Unfortunately, only 0.35% of the total game could be saved. That is, of the more than two thousand possible encounters in the game, this version only contains seven.

Be that as it may, this is a look at a world that could have been, an industry that never really took hold, and a type of videogame that, so many years later, we are still struggling to make.

name: Nine Hole Ninja
description: Use your trusty ninja sword to whack the golf ball into the hole(s)! Just don't expect it to get through the course in one piece...

name: Jump On Head
description: JUMP ON HEAD is a platform fighter with one goal: JUMP ON HEAD. Casuals and pros alike can enjoy its fast-paced, responsive gameplay. Play against up to three friends (currently local multiplayer only) on six diverse stages, and try to be the last player standing!

name: Entities' Repose
description: Entities' Repose is a traffic management game where you are tasked with guiding spirits through the rivers of the underworld. you will need to build the way for them, but soon you will find that there are too many entities!

name: Summer Islands: Growth
description: 3D vacation platformer where you collect bugs and soothe an angry heron god with fish.

name: Momentous: Monumentum
description: Help Biip reach the end of each course in this hand-crafted precision platformer with no cap on velocity.

name: Jim & Dill
description: Sin descripción

name: Fishing RPG
description: Fish your way to victory in this relaxed quest for the ultimate reward: soup.

name: Hämmeri
description: Sin descripción

name: The Blocks Returneth
description: A loving tribute to the Blocks Cometh by Halfbot (2010).

name: Underhaul
description: Look into the new world , "Underhaul" A game about a girl protecting her grandma's life by collecting strawberries in order to create the best medicine for her. Help her in order to succeed in preventing the death of her grand mother.

name: Blank Relish: Remastered
description:
Embark on a journey alongside Private Marian, who lost everything during his crash on an unknown planet, devoid of companionship and lacking his equipment... Will he survive the challenge and come back home?

Experience Marian's struggle for survival and finding purpose amidst the isolation of the unknown planet.

name: Waxwing Radio
description: Sin descripción

name: Bunny on Rails
description:
The bunny needs help getting to the carrot. Can you build a road to get them there?

Place blocks and get rewarded for making the longest road possible! But be careful, replacing already placed blocks gives you a score penalty!

name: Pirates and Aztecs
description: A pirate named Lorencillo searching for the greatest treasure of all time, the lost treasure of Moctezuma. He fights the fearsome Aztecs to obtain a map and a key, but not before resisting the attacks of great Aztec warriors.

name: Tanki 2011
description: Sin descripción

name: Summer Games II
description: The DOS port of Summer Games II features only PC Speakers as audio, and CGA graphics. Another notable thing is that the game is bootable from disk.

name: An Alt Girl for Skoof
description: There is a rumor that any skuf can legally receive a fee alt girl from the state; to do this, you just need to log in to a special service and enter your personal data.

name: The Phenomenon+
description:
The Phenomenon is an episodic survival horror game with high replayability. The main character is Barry Nellan, a paranormal researcher whose work is known around the world. Many cases linked to unexplained activity have been studied. Most yielded no real results, but the last one…

In EPISODE 1, you will explore a 3 square kilometer map with over 500 item spawns, use devices for paranormal research, fight creatures with intelligent and tricky AI and discover many other things that make each new unique game.

Compete with other players to take first place on the global leaderboards.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Kamen Genei Satsujin Jiken
description:
The first case from the Tantei Ryousuke Jiken-tan series remastered for Nintendo DS.

Detective Ryosuke Kaokawa Case Story Masked Phantom Murder Case" for NDS is a work that ported the adventure game "Detective Ryousuke Kibukawa Case File" series distributed by the company for mobile phones to NDS. The story is the original version of the NDS version. The game system also uses NDS's unique functions, and improvements have been made, such as touching the face of the person you want to talk to, and displaying different information on the upper and lower screens.

The player becomes the scenario writer Masao Ikurumi, and challenges to solve the difficult case with Itsuna Shirasagisu, who works as an assistant under the detective Ryosuke Kibukawa. This time, it seems that we will investigate an incident that occurs in a port town, but the detailed story has not been revealed.

Compared to mobile apps, the operability of NDS has been greatly improved. In addition, it has been released from capacity constraints, and the quality of the graphics has also been greatly improved. It is the first title to be released on a consumer game console, but I also want to pay attention to its high quality.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Kamen Genei Satsujin Jiken
description:
A mobile port of the Nintendo DS game "Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Kamen Gen'ei Satsujin Jiken".

Embraced by an illusion, I wear a mask...

"Masked Phantom Murder Case" released on Nintendo DS is now available on the mobile app!
While "virtual" and "reality" are intertwined, the darkness hidden behind the mask is revived in the app...

name: Purple Orchid
description: Sin descripción

name: Alan Wake II: The Final Draft
description:
The Final Draft is the New Game Plus mode for Alan Wake 2, released with Update 13 on December 11, 2023. It includes a new difficulty level (Nightmare), an expanded version of the base ending, new collectables, and other narrative changes/additions.

Players will retain all weapons, Charms and character upgrades earned during their first playthrough.

name: Rollerball
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyouryuu-ki: The Reportage Beyond the Sea
description: Hyouryuu Ki: The Reportage Beyond the Sea begins when a plane crashes on an island. The player must explore the island to find materials to build new items and machines, while keeping the other characters alive by providing them food and water. There are different endings depending of what is build or used to escape the island.

name: Unending Dawn
description: The anime open-world action RPG "Unending Dawn" under development by Chinese studio Parcae’s Fate Studio. it will launch for PlayStation 5, iOS and Android.

name: Test: The Game
description: A project created by midosei, who states that it was going to be something small and short, but it ended taking up three years to make. The whole project is made with default assets from RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Xerd no Densetsu
description: The "Xerd" of the game's title is a hero who defeated evil 800 years in the past. You control another character (default name Jake), prince of the one of the kingdoms, to defeat his evil twin brother by hunting down the reincarnation of the legendary hero.

name: You Can Only Turn Left
description: You Can Only Turn Left is a playful exploration of the hypnagogic state between sleeping and wakefulness. Within this liminal space, memories morph into dreams and dreams feather into reality. You, the player have to navigate these hallucinations by choosing how the character creates their sleeping patterns. Inspired by game books and guided sleep meditations, this story invites you to imagine both the mundane and the fantastic to practice the mental flexibility of an avid dreamer.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Oblivion Edition
description: The Oblivion Edition contains the main game and The Binding Blade DLC. The DLC introduced two new heroes, a special questline, wandering boss, and more.

name: Xerd no Densetsu 2: Xerd!! Gishin no Ryouiki
description: A sequel to Xerd no Densetsu.

name: Floodbound
description: Your goal is to travel through three large areas in the rainy world while dodging Drain Face and his abilities. This is the neutral ending, though you are still killed and you become the next Drain Face (big lore). There's also a good ending, where you collect the souls of your victims (which are represented as glowing glass balls), use them to defeat Drain Face and move into the afterlife with the victims. And lastly, a bad ending, where you actually find your own car in the parallel world's version of the river, along with your body floating inside it. If you have collected the victims' souls by this point, you can physically throw them to smash open the window of your car, which wakes you up in the real world, giving you an unfair second chance at living while destroying the souls of your victims. An ugly, immoral loophole.

name: Control: Expeditions
description: Expeditions are a challenging combat experience with a set time limit for completion aimed at those who have already completed Control.

name: Kirby Air Ride Hack Pack
description: Kirby Air Ride Hack Pack is an improvement mod for Kirby Air Ride released in 2017.

name: Kirby Bowl 64
description: A cancelled sequel for Kirby's Dream Course. It became Kirby's Air Ride, before being finally released as Kirby Air Ride.

name: Bass Fisherman
description: Let's go to Texas to get our bass fishing done, y'all!

name: MTB DirtCross
description: Time to dash down the trail, MTB style!

name: Kyokugen Dasshutsu Minigame: Renda Shibou Desu
description:
'Kyokugen Dasshutsu Minigame: Renda Shibou Desu', translated roughly as 'Zero Escape Mini Game: Hit the Button to Kill', was a small flash game hosted on Chunsoft's Japanese website. The goal is to help Clover inside of a gate by rapidly clicking on the door. As the gate opens, the clicking action switches from opening the gate to seemingly groping/slapping Clover's breasts.

Three gates are presented, though Clover's outfit changes depending on which gate the player is presented to open. The first gate's outfit is her typical getup in Virtue's Last Reward, the second is a sukumizu (スク水), and the third is a black bikini. The third gate is notably difficult and its reward is cut short by Clover covering up her nearly-revealed breasts while K's portrait is laid over her face.

name: Winning Lure
description: Get your rod and reel on! A fishing game with a fishing rod accessory included.

name: Mystery of Munroe Manor
description: Two years after returning from an expedition in Africa, Lord Munroe is still being absent from public life. You are the famous sleuth Basil Byron and your task is to find the whereabouts of the missing adventurer.

name: Pegasis
description: Joust clone

name: Where's Tess
description: Where's Tess is an offline adventure story in the visual novel genre in the style of anime and sim game about becoming the ultimate travel blogger and influencer.

name: Zelda no Densetsu: 4-tsu no Tsurugi +
description: Zelda no Densetsu: 4-tsu no Tsurugi + is the name of the Japanese (and Korean) version of The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures. This version has an additional game (or mode) called Navi Trackers, which wasn't released in the international version.

name: Spotlight: Choose Your Romance
description: A brand new interactive story game with top of the line animation featuring stories from the authors you love!

name: Vows of Eternity
description: You are an aspiring writer hoping to get into university. You leave the comforts of the countryside to pursue your studies, but getting a scholarship seems a lot harder than you’ve imagined! Even with a part-time job at a quaint cafe, you’re barely making ends meet, and the dream of getting a college degree seems to be slipping away from your grasp.

name: Pawsitive
description: Pawsitive is a healthy adventure RPG that lets you turn your healthy habits into energy for a virtual puppy. A mix between retro Tamagotchi pet games and modern health tracking, Pawsitive helps gamers reclaim their health with fun quests and healthy prizes.

name: Sushi Bar
description: Sin descripción

name: South Pole Bebop
description:
A multiplayer Into The Breach-inspired turn-based strategy game. It is designed for two players, is set on a 9x9 board where each player controls characters and bases. Each player commands three characters and three bases, aiming to eliminate the opponent's characters or bases while fending off a zombie horde that attacks both players.

Players can create a customizable deck before each game, consisting of three characters and up to 15 unique ability cards that enhance bases and provide special powers to characters. During gameplay, players can purchase ability cards using collectable cores. These cards are limited to those included in the player's deck, which can be modified and reused for subsequent games.

name: Child of Ruin
description:
In this narrative RPG, you join Ravi and their two companion spirits in their quest across the Echoing Isles found high in the sky.

Experience an emotional journey governed by calamity in an attempt to recover your lost memories.

But remember... you must pay the price of your choices in full.

name: Switch! Love Over Flowers
description: Ever since your mother fell ill, you’ve spent your days working at a flower shop to pay her bills. Your life is simple, but you find it fulfilling, until one day, a customer comes in who turns your life upside down.

name: Anime Story Otome Game: Comino
description: Sin descripción

name: Ayakashi & Sweets
description: The Mysterious Ayakashi and the Sweets Shops: A Love Story is a romance game for women. The game plays like reading a novel. You continue to read the story, you make choices, and simply enjoy a romantic relationship with a great male character of your choosing.

name: Animal Zodiac
description: In this game, you tap the screen to drop an animal, then keep matching the same animals to make them bigger and aim for a high score.

name: My Young Boyfriend Part 1
description: In this interactive Romance Otome Game, the one in control of the romantic story is you! You have multiple option as to how the story will go.

name: Fairy Boyfriend
description: In this interactive romance Otome story choice game, the one in control of the romantic story is you! You have multiple option as to how the story will go.

name: Shop of Forgotten Memories
description:
When your beloved grandmother passes away under mysterious circumstances, you’re left to pick up the pieces of her legacy.

But this is no regular family inheritance—instead, you find yourself the brand-new owner of an antique shop filled to the brim with unique and exotic artifacts.

name: Sleepless Cinderella: Party
description:
Become the heroine in a modern time fairytale!
Make your dream celebrity fall in love with Voltage’s new dating sim. Enjoy the new and improved user interface and choose your virtual boyfriend from a group of incredibly handsome celebrities!

name: The Princess in the Mirror
description: From Voltage's famous interactive romance series comes the glitzy, fairy tale world of The Princess in the Mirror!

name: Life Is A Game
description: Simulation game where you see the life of a person from birth until death. Your character is always running as time is always ticking. The life you live is dictated by the choices you make and the amount and type of coins you collect.

name: Twilight Host Club
description: When a new vampire-themed host club opens up nearby, your college roommate immediately wants to go. Though you're hesitant at first, you soon find you quite enjoy being waited on by the ‘unliving’ staff. But things take a dark turn when you cut your finger and the hosts’ reactions get a bit too real…

name: A Game's Tale
description: Welcome to "A Game's Tale”, where you´ll enjoy tactical battles, grow your deck as you travel through a fantasy world. While meeting charming characters along the way, you will discover the secret of why we play.

name: Girl Who Cried Wolf
description: Breaking news! A werewolf-like beast has been attacking the city, and the Lunar Ledger wants you on the case! Eager to overcome your rookie status, you’re excited to make headlines alongside the paper’s star journalist, your sexy new CEO, and the charming politician at the heart of the scoop, but then you discover that your new team might be more wild than they let on…

name: Desires of a Vampire
description: Your days are spent as a simple maid in service to a powerful vampire lord. Luckily, the lord you serve is kind and gentle with you, as long as you let him drink your blood. Just as your relationship with your lord begins to move beyond professional, your beautiful estate is stormed by angry vampire hunters. At first, the leader of the group thinks you’re just another trapped human, but then he realizes you have a secret that runs through your veins…

name: Desires of a Dragon Prince
description:
You’ve been taught about dragons since birth without knowing your true bloodline until one day you’re whisked away to a different world—a world full of dragons that have their own set of rules and clans. You’re accompanied by three handsome princes who tell you that you’re the Lost Dragon Princess and must take your place on the throne if the Dragon World is ever going to see peace amongst themselves and humans again!

The path is treacherous as you and your princely companions struggle to unite the clans. It seems there’s another dark force at work that’s just waiting to see you fail. You wonder how you can unite the Four Clans when your princes can’t even seem to agree amongst themselves half of the time. Will you let the bickering over you keep you from your mission?

Find out in Desires of a Dragon Prince!

name: Star Scandal
description: As a newbie photojournalist, the glittering world of the rich and famous seems impossibly out of reach, but all that is about to change. Not even one day into your job, you suddenly find yourself rubbing shoulders with the crème de la crème of the celebrity world alongside the very hands-on CEO of your agency. Knowing who is trying to butter you up and who genuinely holds your best interests at heart could be the difference between rising to the top or being savaged in the latest news cycle.

name: Demonic Crusade
description: As a humble seamstress eking out a living in these fog-drenched streets, you’ve always sought something more, and the recent string of murders only reinforces how fleeting life can be. When the most eligible bachelor in the city promises to grant your greatest wish, you barely have time to count your blessings before fate intervenes and reveals that his offer is actually a contract for your soul!

name: Faded Melodies
description: Enjoy a musical odyssey of love and transformation at Harmony Heights Academy. As a former virtuoso violinist turned junior high music teacher, you'll navigate the echoes of a tragic accident and meet three captivating men: Ryota, the competitive pianist; Eiji, the enigmatic cellist; and Takumi, the eccentric composer. Your decisions will harmonize love, rivalry, and personal growth in this symphony of destiny.

name: Love's Eternal Wishes
description: You’re a gifted Wisher with a mysterious past, embark on a journey to uncover the truth behind your unique powers. Along the way, you'll form deep connections with a diverse cast of characters, including the enigmatic Prince Asher, the compassionate Rowan, and the rugged protector Stone. As you navigate a world filled with ancient curses, dark secrets, and powerful magic, you'll grapple with questions of identity, redemption, and the true nature of love. With each wish granted and each memory uncovered, you'll inch closer to unraveling the mysteries that bind your fate to those around you.

name: Tokyo Rock Redemption
description: Dive into the dazzling world of visual kei and join the battle against dark music in this full-length 15-chapter game. The stage is set, the crowd is waiting, and your adventure is about to begin!

name: My Hotel Romance
description: Sin descripción

name: Enchanted Hearts
description: After witnessing a handsome stranger in peril, you rush to save him, only to unleash a magical power you never knew you had. Little did you know, you're actually part of a bloodline of powerful witches and warlocks. Soon after, you receive an invitation to attend Nocturne Academy, a school for supernatural beings, to help you master your newfound abilities. However, you soon find yourself caught in the middle of an ancient feud between werewolves and vampires.

name: Inferno’s Embrace
description: Embark on a journey to Wyverndale Academy, where you’ll uncover a hidden society of dragon hybrids and confront secrets that blur the line between humanity and magic. As dark forces rise, team up with dragons Niko, Vidar, and Dravon to navigate a world torn between peaceful coexistence and looming dominance. Embrace your unique power, balance loyalty and duty, and rewrite your destiny!

name: Midnight Serenade
description: Step into the vibrant, sultry world of Crescent City, where music, mystery, and magic collide. As a talented but struggling jazz singer, you face an impossible choice to save your ailing father by striking a desperate bargain at the crossroads with a devil by the name of Lucian Cross, a seductive music producer with a dark secret.

name: Bloodworth Academy Occult Club
description: After rebelling one too many times, your parents have enrolled you in a prestigious, secluded boarding school, hoping to set you straight. However, you quickly discover that your new campus is a playground for the supernatural. As if that wasn't surprising enough, you're forced by the school's rigorous rules to join a club or risk expulsion. Thankfully, the newly-established occult club offers you a spot, conditional on proving your worth.

name: Genius Supernatural Romance
description: Enjoy sizzling-hot and dangerously spicy stories of romance with devils, grim reapers and immortals! Make exciting decisions throughout the story to enjoy your very own unique experience! These are 3 of our best supernatural romance titles for you to enjoy as a bundle with reduced costs! Who will you choose to be your supernatural lover...?

name: Millionaire Monster Penthouse
description: You’ve just landed a new job in the city in a luxurious penthouse, free condo included! It’s a job anyone would die for. The building is opulent, the location—prime, and all the residents look like they just walked out of a fashion magazine.

name: Bloodlust Rebellion
description: In a vampire-ruled post-apocalyptic world, join the rebellion to overthrow the iron-fisted Vampire King Xavier and his corrupt reign. Guided by the charismatic Gideon, navigate a perilous landscape filled with supernatural creatures and ancient artifacts, including the mind-controlling device, The Nexus. With your loyal childhood friend and battle-hardened partner, Thorne, face the challenges of the rebellion and ignite a forbidden connection with the enigmatic vampire, Elric, that tests your beliefs and fuels your desire for revolution.

name: Servants of the Night
description: After waking up in the forest with a head injury and no memories, you follow the moonlit path to a nearby mansion. To your surprise and confusion, the three handsome butlers greet you as if they’ve been awaiting your return! Apparently, you’re the mistress of the household who disappeared some years back.

name: Love at Any Cost
description: You’ve always put your work before your love life, so when your younger sister announces her engagement, you need to find a date ASAP! Luckily, you find a service that provides just what you’re looking for—a handsome, wealthy businessman. But when you discover that your rental boyfriend is hiding something, will you be able to keep up the charade? Can a fake relationship lead to real love?

name: Heart of Atlantis
description: Since you were young, you’ve always felt as if something was calling you to the sea. Now, as an oceanography student, you come across the discovery of a lifetime with your dark and broodingly handsome professor—the sunken city of Atlantis. But your field study takes an unexpected turn when your submarine crashes and you wake in the arms of a beautiful merman, who’s the crown prince of the lost kingdom.

name: Married to the Mafia
description: One evening, you’re invited by your uncle to an engagement dinner for a famous local mafia boss—but then a handsome stranger pulls you on stage and reveals that his new fiancée is you!

name: Apartment Love Triangle
description: You’ve found the perfect apartment… The only problem is, it’s for couples only! Navigate your way through the crazy antics of a new city, a new job, and an unexpected love triangle—with four gorgeous bachelors to choose from, you'll never have a dull moment! Will you be able to keep up with the drama and find your true love?

name: Monstrous Cravings
description: Amidst a city plagued by consumption and vampires, you seek to uncover the truth behind your brother's disappearance. But as you investigate, you’re suddenly whisked away by a distinguished vampire gentleman to join a secret organization. The group seems to be fighting against the darkness, but the question remains—as a creature of the night, can this man really be trusted?

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite
description: Arena Breakout: Infinite is an ultra-real immersive military simulation. Join a fight to shoot, loot, and raid your path to fortune.

name: Dark Samurai Avengers
description: Rumors of the Black Hole Sun Prophecy, an era of endless darkness, spread as several towns and cities are blotted out by an eclipse. Your beloved father, a top shogun, and brother have been slain in battle by General Benki—an evil warlord rumored to dabble in the dark arts.

name: Full Moon Mafia
description: You’re on your way home, full moon lighting your way, when you’re suddenly attacked by a wolf-like creature leaving you with a nasty bite. But before it can cause any further damage, you’re saved by two handsome men, who also seem to be part wolf! You quickly recognize them as part of the local mob, the Bloodhounds.

name: Demonic Suitors
description: You have just received an invitation to a prestigious school and are on your way when your chauffeur takes a sudden turn into a dark tunnel! You’re certain this must be a mistake but after the bumpy ride, you’re greeted by a devilishly handsome young man who calls you “princess.” Just one thing, though—he’s got horns on his head! If there’s one thing the school failed to inform you, it’s that the school is for demons.

name: Kiss Me, Kill Me
description: Working for a contract-killing agency has been nothing but grunt work so far, but at last, you’re about to hit the big time. Your next target promises to be an easy mark, and then you and your sickly little brother will be set for life… or so you thought.

name: High School Secret Romance
description: Life as a teenager is already hard, but thanks to the mountain of debt left behind by your estranged mother, you and your father can barely make ends meet. Luckily, one of your father's connections offers you a spot at a prestigious high school that could change everything. But there's a catch—it’s an all-boys school, and you’ll need to pose as a boy to avoid getting kicked out!

name: Pirate Lords of Love
description: Your life in a seaside town has been peaceful but dull—until an infamous, wealthy samurai suitor approaches you one day and asks for your hand in marriage. As a wedding gift, he gives you a magnificent black pearl necklace. After your father dies of a sudden illness, distant relatives eagerly arrange the union, despite your misgivings.

name: Dungeon Sweeper
description:
It's a puzzle or clicker game where you expand the world map while identifying dungeon locations, much like Minesweeper.
As your score increases, biomes multiply, making it livelier. It's a relaxing game, so give it a try!

name: Supernatural Nightlife Lovers
description: When a big-shot gangster shows up at your family restaurant to collect a debt, you're forced to moonlight at an underground club to pay it all back. Little did you know you’d be working in a neon sanctuary for supernatural beings looking to escape their human lives. While learning the ropes, you meet a salacious pure-blood vampire who’s been a regular for over 200 years, butt heads with a grumpy Lycan manager, and help steer a street-smart dhampir ruffian toward his dream career as an aspiring chef. Can you settle into your freakishly new normal or will your heroic plan go bust?

name: Welcome to the Yokai Inn
description: A quest to save your father whisks you away to the doorstep of Sankiya Inn, the most famous ryokan in the yokai world. There, you broker a deal with the handsome oni owner to work in exchange for room and board, and soon find yourself training under a friendly bakeneko coworker and mingling with otherworldly guests, including a mysterious ronin…

name: Psychic Supernatural Boyfriend
description: You’re fresh out of the detective academy and ready for your first assignment. Thanks to your acute ability to sense the supernatural, you’re tasked with hunting down your first demon alongside a veteran detective.

name: Fate of the Foxes
description: Legend tells of three fox brothers who once protected your town and were worshipped as gods, until one day, they turned on humankind. Desperate, the townsfolk called on Inari, god of foxes, to save them. Her response was to grant a local girl the power to bring the three unruly deities to heel. Or so they say…

name: Escape From The Boykisser
description: Help the "friend" and escape from this place or surrender to the clutches of this monster.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Then Wake to Weep
description:
Version 2.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Robin and Boothill
• New Trailblaze mission: The Fool Always Rings Twice
• New areas: Dreamflux Reef, Soulglad Festivity Auditions and Penacony Grand Theater
• New quality of life updates
• New main event: Clockie Dreamjoy Memoir
• …and more!

name: Grim Dawn: Fangs of Asterkarn
description: In this latest massive installment of Grim Dawn, you will journey West into the rugged wilderness of Asterkarn and contend with the mighty Kurn. Discover the dark legacy that continues to haunt these nomadic people and again drives them East, towards renewed conflict.

name: Pumpkin Attack!
description:
The Halloween’s Day is coming but the skeletons want to replace it with the Skeleton’s Day! Only Pumpkin Smith riding a rocket with a laser cannon can save the day!

Defeat the minions and fight the four skeleton bosses: Skeletog, Skeledemon, Skelebi, and Skeleskull. Each final boss has a weak point, but you need to discover it.

name: The Mandalorian: Chapter 3 - The Sin
description: A reimagining of The Mandalorian, Chapter 3: The Sin as a Game Boy game.

name: Real Drone Simulator
description:
RDS is a realistic drone simulator which is focusing on FPV drones at the moment including freestyle and racing. The simulator is based on real life physics formulas and includes existing drones and parts with the cooperation of manufacturers.
Learn to fly FPV or just have fun RDS is free for personal use.

name: Batman: The Junkyard Challenge
description:
Do you love Batman, but yearn for more? Do you find the game to be too easy? Are you looking for a challenge? If so then this may be the hack for you.

This hack came about because of conversations with Batman speedrunner junkyard_dave wherein existing hacks of the game were lamented. This hack aims to rectify the situation by providing a new and difficult experience for anyone daring enough to attempt The Junkyard Challenge.

This hack features all new (and significantly more difficult) stages. Other changes that add to the challenge include enemy placements/health and boss AI. The item drop tables have also been changed. Though difficult, note that damage boosts are not required in this hack. It is possible that some maneuvers that require sub-pixel precision to avoid damage have slipped through the cracks, but this would be no more than a few instances. If well executed nearly all (if not actually all) of the game should be playable damage-less.

name: Metroid: Dark Alliance
description: Unlike most Metroid hacks that use the original Metroid as the basis, this Metroid hack is a complete overhaul of the game Blaster Master for NES. Guide Samus on this new journey as she crashes on an unknown planet, then quickly begins to realize the familiarity of the atmosphere. As always, enjoy and feel free to improve!

name: Final Fantasy V Spoof
description: This is a comedy / parody hack of Final Fantasy 5.

name: Bubble Bobble 2
description: Bubble Bobble 2 is a hack for the Amstrad CPC port of Bubble Bobble by someone going by U.W. representing Saturn-Soft a made up developer name. The game is the same as the first except you play as the blue dinosaur this time. Oh and the levels are harder! More complex! and sometimes tell you to give up!

name: DK: King of Swing Remix
description:
This hack replaces the game’s levels with new custom designed levels built using the game’s existing assets. The tutorial, Jungle Jam and boss levels have not been edited.

In addition to the custom levels, this hack also includes:

- Character selection screen in adventure mode: unlocked after completing adventure mode (or by using the password 00011000).
- The tutorial and intro can now be skipped by holding select when starting adventure mode.

name: 5-Star
description: Yongbok works delivering food for the 5-STAR Restaurant (which his boss says it’s a 5-star Michelin even though there’s no such thing). He must travel to various locations and deliver food boxes to various houses. But he must be careful, for there are mischievous creatures who want to take food boxes from his hands.

name: CommanDSKeen
description:
CommanDS Keen is an adaptation of a PC platform game to the NDS. It is an adaptation of an open source software originally named CloneKeen Caitlin Shaw, which is a platform-based video game series produced by id Software and released by Apogee Software in the early 1990s.

This DS port allows you to play episodes 1 Marooned on Mars, 2 The Earth Explodes and 3 Keen Must Die!

name: Bill & Ted: Time & Time Again
description:
In this game, you must help the future versions of yourself to collect all of the objects and return to the phone booth without touching another version of yourself.

You get only two lives, one as Bill the second as Ted.

name: Giana Sisters DS
description: Giana Sisters DS is a 2007 port of a Commodore 64 classic The Great Giana Sisters to the Nintendo DS. Not to be confused with the officially released 2009 remake of the same name.

name: YatzyDOS
description: YatzyDOS is a NDS port of an old console based dice game Yatzy from DOS. It is a turn-based dice game. The goal is to get the highest possible score by adding up the corresponding points gained through certain dice combinations.

name: Squirm
description:
This is a DS port of Squirm, a PacMan style arcade game, from Commodore 16. It reuses all original graphics, in attempts to remain as faithful as possible to the original version.

Navigate around the maze while steering clear of the Squirms.

You need to find and eat 200 eggs laid by the Queen Squirm. And like PacMan, if a squirm gets to you, then you will be back to the start.

name: Hachinoid
description:
Are you a bad enough dude to take on the evil BLOXX empire?

This is a simple breakout clone for the NEC PC-8801.

It was designed and tested in V1-S mode (i.e. the original hardware spec), but if you want a challenge, it works great in high-speed memory mode V1-H or V2 mode as well.

Rules:
WIN / LOSE : Destroy all the bricks to win. If the ball touches the bottom of the screen, you lose. When you win a stage, the game will take you back to the title screen / level select, but will save your score. Aim for the highest score!
SCORING : All bricks are worth the same - 1 point. If you destroy a brick with your power wave, though, you will get 2 points.
EDGE and POWER WAVE: The Bloxx Empire is edgy. Striking a brick on its edge will grant you an edge point and charge your power wave, but the effect on your ball can be unpredictable. Watch out!

name: Simple Battle FX
description: Sin descripción

name: Maxwell The Cat
description: Help Maxwell the cat save his friend, while avoiding doge and collecting cookies and cart-wheels.

name: Electrocardioground FX
description:
A minimalist arcade game about keeping the beat alive.

Features 2 game modes and alternating colours.

name: Defender FX
description:
Defender FX is inspired by the classic game.

Your planet is under attack! Save the treasures from being stolen.

name: AllYourArdu
description: SHMUP game for the Arduboy meme jam with references to Zero Wing

name: I want 5 quadrillion yen!
description: 5000兆円欲しい! (Gosen Cho-yen Hoshii!) is an internet meme which had been prevailed in Japan in 2017. Capture money with a goal of 5 quadrillion yen.

name: ExolonFX
description: ExolonFX is an Arduboy conversion of the ZX Spectrum release of Exolon, a run and gun game programmed by Raffaele Cecco and published by Hewson Consultants in 1987.

name: Yatzy
description: It’s your favorite dice based poker game on a portable device. You can play up to 3 players on the same device, so challenge your friends. Yatzy is a dice game where players need to score as many points as possible, by rolling five dice to make different combinations. This game consists of 13 rounds with the scorecard having 13 categories. Roll the dice up to three times and choose which scoring category is to be used for that round. Once a category has been used in the game, it cannot be used again. The winner is the player who scores the most points.

name: Arkanoid vs. the Occult
description:
Arkanoid is back to fight the evil occult powers in: Arkanoid VS the Occult

Every screen is more or less connected to occult symbolism (or conspiracies). Some of the symbols are quite distorted due to the limitations of blocks per screen
The game now has black blocks (instead of cyan) which do not exist in the original version
The balancing between the stages is a bit wonky, but all stages are completable. Easy mode recommended
Startscreen by Svambo (thx a lot!)
Full 99 level romhack (just the boss stages weren’t edited)

name: Songs of Travel
description: An animated graphic novel exploring the unique stories of five migrants seeking new beginnings in Europe. Together, these stories paint a mosaic of themes such as our hopes, dreams, and identities; home; and the things we treasure most.

name: Amstrad Compilation Disk Spectrum Plus 3
description:
This compilation includes:

- Mailstrom
- N.O.M.A.D.
- Gift from the Gods
- Cosmic Wartoad
- Daley Thompson's Super-Test

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0 - In A Dark Past
description: In this hack, you will discover how they ended up having such opposite ideals and objectives starting off from a context where they both were allies and even close friends. The hack will then, of course, connect with the Explorers storyline at its very end, adding up for a great backstory for this two great characters in addition to their contribution to the plot and their beloved Special Episode, which concluded their story beautifully.

name: Kira Kira Magical Stars
description: Kira Kira Magical Stars is a cute fantasy magical girl top-down shooter and platformer.

name: Campaña contra el Opio 2024
description: It is a thematic game of an anti-opium campaign aimed at a smaller audience.

name: Touhou Shinpiroku: Urban Legend in Limbo.
description: An expanded port of Touhou 14.5 for PlayStation 4 that adds Reisen Udongein Inaba as a new character, a new stage taking place in Eientei, new modes, new remixed songs, and resolution support up to 1080p.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Trials After Justice
description:
Set between Ace Attorney: Justice for All and Trails and Tribulations. In Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney ‘Trials after Justice’ Phoenix and Maya continue to help those in need by defending them. Along the way, they come across a new prosecutor named Luis Hawk, who seems to have it in for Phoenix. (Don’t they all?) During these trials, Phoenix learns about his new rival. Is he a friend or foe to justice?

Originally intended to be 4 cases, but cancelled after 3 was finished.

name: Sim Settlements 2
description: A sequel to the popular Sim Settlements mod, containing three chapters with dozens of fully voiced characters and storylines based around a deeply expanded settlement building system.

name: Zombie Island Paradise
description: When your first mission in the field lands you on the popular dating show called ‘Be My Match,' things seem to be going as planned. The world’s most eligible billionaire bachelor is wrapped around your finger, while the flirtatious, blockbuster actor-turned-host uses his Hollywood charm to ‘turn up the heat’ once the cameras stop rolling. But when a mysterious, heavy hearted research scientist crosses your path with a dire warning, all hell breaks loose. As paradise unexpectedly falls and a zombie outbreak ravages the island, will you be able to lead three men to safety and still accomplish your mission?

name: Chimera: Complex Hearts
description: It’s the end of the 21st century, and a mysterious new contagion is ravaging the world. Known as ‘Chimera Complex’, it causes painful and irreversible mutations that mimic aspects of animal biology in those who contract the condition. One way or another, no patient survives for long.

name: The Kabuki Phantom
description: You’ve fallen into a rut after finishing college, so when your beloved uncle invites you to apprentice at his kabuki playhouse in Tokyo, you jump at the opportunity to try something new. Before long, you find yourself swept up in the colorful world of Japanese dance-drama alongside your new colleagues—two captivating actors and the theater’s stern manager.

name: Forest of Destiny
description: Working at your stepfather’s real estate company gets a lot more complicated when three animal spirits reveal themselves to you. Calling themselves Protectors of the Sacred Forest, they come in search of a new Forest Guardian and the means to save their home from impending destruction.

name: Syndicate Boyfriend: Gem Heist
description: Socialite by day and cat burglar by night, you're the infamous marvel burglarizing Shine City's elites. Ever since your ex-partner betrayed you, you've sworn off working with others, but once you receive an enticing invitation from a group of alluring thieves, curiosity strikes. Can the four of you successfully infiltrate the world's most expensive casino to steal the pink diamond, or are these sly guys simply stray dogs?

name: The Curse of Death's Kiss
description: In the harsh world of Victorian high society, it pays to have a good name and a handsome butler by your side. But things aren’t as they seem… For you are cursed.

name: Crimson Twilight: Undead Lover
description: You always have your finger on the pulse of local anomalies, folklore, and school scandals, giving you somewhat of a reputation as a meddler. Even the new transfer student, Yusuke Mallory, can't catch a break from your curiosity.

name: Enigma Squad: Animal Chaos
description: One night, you fall asleep at the city library and wake up to discover three beastly superheroes arguing. Suddenly, you find yourself dragged into their secret world—one where animal hybrids are oppressed and corrupted, or become disgruntled vigilantes like the Enigma Squad. With your lab connections, street smarts, and animal instincts, they need you to help their cause against a growing threat terrorizing Provenance City—The Ringmaster. Fighting crime together isn’t always easy, but forging new bonds sparks closeness and romance while stamping out evil and bringing justice back to the city—Enigma Squad assemble!

name: My Secret Ocean Boyfriend
description: When your swim club is threatened with dissolution, it's up to you to find new members. Luckily, you manage to recruit three handsome men for your cause.

name: Tomb of the Forbidden Falcon
description: As an archaeology student, you're thrilled when you're selected for a prestigious internship at a dig site in Egypt. Your first field study takes an unexpected turn, however, when you and your companions discover an ancient mummy, and people around you begin to die... Together, can you uncover the truth behind this curse and save the expedition, or will you end up as its next victims?

name: Onmyoji: Beyond Time
description: When you were a child, the death of your mother closed the door on a supernatural world that few are able to see. Now in your final year of university, your father’s death wrenches that door open again, awakening strong spiritual powers that have long been dormant in you.

name: Knights of Romance and Valor
description: Caught between boring lectures and relentless bullies, a book on the legends of Camelot and its famous knights has been a welcome source of refuge. When an unknown force spirits you away to King Arthur’s court, that escape suddenly becomes a lot more real — if you can believe it!

name: Twilight Lovers
description: After discovering that your dangerously attractive coworkers are vampires, you’re prepared to abandon your promising career at Sunderland Research in order to save your neck. But these vampires aren’t your typical bloodthirsty monsters—they want a cure for their bloodlust and are currently working on a serum for it. With a change of heart, you decide to stay, but it isn’t long until the company’s security is breached by a rogue vampire seeking to destroy the serum. In the midst of his attack, he gets a whiff of your blood and finds something he wants just as much as the serum—you.

name: Wanted: Gunslinger's Kiss
description: Your life as a promising young deputy in a wild land inhabited by giant monsters and dangerous outlaws takes an unexpected turn when you're framed for murder while on your first field assignment. Before long, you've been captured by the most infamous group of mercenaries in the land—the Lazarus Gang, who are eager to claim the price on your head. On the way to turn you in, however, you realize that these outlaws aren't the evil men you expected… and they discover that you're a bounty unlike any other.

name: Lullaby of Demonia
description: As a merchant trading in interdimensional artifacts, you've garnered an eclectic clientele in your travels—one of whom just so happens to be the Emperor of the Demonic Astral Plane himself, Lucifer!

name: Code: Replicant
description: After narrowly escaping a kidnapping attempt, you find yourself swept into a world of cutting-edge science and subterfuge. Your rescuers, three handsome replicants with deadly skills, have a secret that will lead you to unravel some secrets of your own. Can you discover the truth about your past and save the one you love in time?

name: Charming Tails
description: When your mom suddenly falls ill with an incurable disease, you’re about to lose all hope when you remember the legend of the cat realm—a place where wishes come true…

name: Sealed With a Dragon’s Kiss
description: One fateful night, you look up to see a mysterious creature being attacked - a dragon! Despite your efforts to help him, there’s nothing a mere human can do to fight against his assailant. As a last resort, you agree to let the dragon drink your blood.

name: Horas Extra Terrestres
description: Sin descripción

name: Twilight Fangs
description: Vampires and humans have coexisted for many generations now. United in their fight against the werewolf menace, an uneasy alliance has been formed between the two races. Times seem peaceful now and as a college student, things seemed to be going smoothly. However, one day on the way home, you and your vampire friend Rayleigh come across a mysterious man named Vice who’s been injured. You try to help him, but he disappears before you can call an ambulance.

name: Demon Hunter: Cursed Hearts
description: After witnessing the death of your father, you learn that you come from a long line of demon hunters. What's more, your mother's locket was once the property of a powerful demon hunter, and contains one half of an ancient, powerful demon known only as the Founder.

name: Queen Pirate: Love Adrift
description: For anyone else, setting sail for a betrothal would be a dangerous proposition—but the Crystal Eye in your possession, your bejeweled birthright, makes you unsinkable. But on the eve of your betrothal, a treacherous plot unfolds. Suddenly you're surrounded by three debonair pirates eager to steal your booty.

name: Lustrous Heart
description: As one of the last surviving members of the Gem clan—a group of people known for their snow-white hair, glittering blue eyes, and telekinetic abilities—you’ve been kept in protective isolation for most of your life.

name: Sins of the Everlasting Twilight
description: You live a peaceful life in a beautiful town lit by a neverending sunset. But you can’t help but question the world you live in. “There are too many things that don’t make sense in this world.”

name: My Starry Princess
description: Senior life at Mori Academy transforms in a flash when you trade places with a look-alike space princess. Can you handle a curriculum of magic and alchemy while living with three popular alien princes? Fake it till you make it, Princess!

name: Isekai: Warrior's Kiss
description: Your passion for antiquity turns adventurous when you’re miraculously transported to the fantastical Kingdom of Lydia—where you’re hailed as the Phoenix! Your prophesied destiny unites you with four Celestial Warriors—a Fire Dog, Dragon, Kitsune, and Wind Horse—to journey daring heights across a vibrant, ancient world in search of the fabled Serpent Stones. Will you find the artifacts you seek—not to mention true loyalty and companionship with these mythical fighters from the East?

name: Casefile: Tokyo Noir
description: You've taken up work as a freelance journalist in an effort to unravel the mystery behind your brother's death. You’ve set up your office above his best friend’s café, but haven't found any leads—until a mysterious man hires you to tail a young yakuza leader to a bar.

name: Everlasting Alchemists
description: Can an eternal soul experience everlasting love?

name: Kamisama Spirits of the Shrine
description: When you accidentally damage a Shinto shrine, you’re forced to pay off your debt by becoming a miko to the handsome spirits who live there—an irritable god, sly fox familiar, and energetic lion-dog guardian.

name: Quest of Lost Memories
description: You wake up inside the latest virtual reality MMORPG but have no memory of starting the game. In fact, you can't recall your past at all. Upon discovering your class as a healer and noticing a one-of-a-kind weapon in your inventory, you're quickly recruited by a dashing mage to join his guild. Things take a dark turn, however, when a virus breaks out and begins infecting and killing players in real life when they log off. In a race against the clock, you and your guildmates embark on a quest to discover and destroy the source...

name: Love on the Edge
description: Orphaned at a young age, you were lucky enough to be taken in by the Faruta crime family and trained in the ways of assassination. But when your compassionate nature stops you from fulfilling your role, you’re suddenly no more than a liability to be traded away…

name: Conspiracies of the Heart
description: You're a tough-talking, quick-witted community officer committed to protecting others, but what happens when the roles get reversed? After a bizarre chain of events kicks off leading to your parents' disappearance, three enigmatic men waltz into your life, eager to avenge you. As you stumble across strange conspiracies and salvage phantom memories, it’s clear those closest to you have a past they're unwilling to reveal. At the end of the day, who can your heart really trust?

name: Cyber City Knights
description: In a near-future world, crime is rampant and nowhere is safe for the average citizen. Police officers are long gone, replaced by a new breed of privatized officers - Knights.

name: A Villain's Twisted Heart
description: Since childhood, you've had the strange ability to breathe life into the words you read aloud. You recognized the dangerous potential of this gift long ago and swore never to use it — until a hooded stranger forces you to summon chaos into this world, and you accidentally read three handsome, familiar characters to life!

name: The Rondo of Oblivion
description: Dear Guest, welcome to Moonwake Manor – a place that will grant your deepest desires. It is with great pleasure and honor to invite you to a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. You may find that the sun never rises and that your only way out is to participate in this game I’ve organized for you and your fellow guests. Do not be frightened, however. Remember your desires lead you here and with desires comes sacrifice. I look forward to seeing how far you will go to reunite with your long-lost brother.

name: Guardians of the Zodiac
description: You’re a young college student studying an ancient scroll, which is said to have ties to the Chinese Zodiac. Though it hasn't been opened for centuries, you manage to remove its seal. Before you can read it, a flash of light blinds you and the scroll is stolen from your hands!

name: Blood Moon Calling
description: Your comfortable life is shattered by the disappearance of your father and the spread of a mysterious scourge. While searching for a cure, a dangerous vampire lord steals you away for some unknown purpose and introduces you to a world of night. Mesmerized by Gothic castles, secret passages, and endless opulence, you fall further into the darkness.

name: Anger of Stick 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventures in Heaven
description: Imagine having hundreds of games right at your fingertips. "Adventures In Heaven" is what everyone has been waiting for! It's challenging! Adventurous! Exciting! Mind Boggling! Fun! and Educational! The games vary from challenging your mind, exploring fascinating places, capturing the enemies, using your imagination to escape from the monsters as in the smash hit "Monster Bash", to playing a tetris game, cards & casino games or regular board games such as Chess or Scrabble. This CD features a "State of the Art" Easy to use Menu System, mouse support, file manager and Screen Saver. Game Categories Include: Adventure, arcade, board games, cards & casino, demos, educational games, mind challenge, planes, trains & automobiles, puzzles and mazes, SoundBlaster support, sports, strategy, tetris, top 20 games of 1992 and 1993. This CD will provide the user(s) with hours of entertainment & fun! "Adventures in Heaven" can be enjoyed by all ages!

name: Another Sonic 2 Remake
description:
A hand drawn fan remake of the Master System and Game Gear version of Sonic 2. Currently playable as a 7 level demo with multiple difficulty modes, a boss rush, and a time attack. Debuted at the Sonic Amateur games Expo 2022, the final game is expected to release by 2029.

The game is powered by the open source "Open Surge" Engine and is developed by Just John 43, with an OST selected from across the Sonic community.

name: The Lost Fate of the Oni
description:
"Dangerous oni lurk outside, so you must never leave the mansion."
Raised under the protective wing of your loving father, you've always heeded these words and stayed safe inside. Life in the mansion may be comfortable, but you wish that you could experience the outside world just once.

name: Trap Dungeons 2
description: Trap Dungeons 2 is a crazy 2D action-adventure game where you have to go from one point to another. Just be careful of the traps.

name: My Elemental Prince
description: It’s a lazy afternoon at your high school, so after class you take a nap at your desk and when you wake up, you feel strange because the dream you just had ended abruptly. A sudden wave knocks you over and when you get up again, you’re not where you used to be. That odd occurrence has transported you to another world, a land belonging to elemental spirits. Soon you’re confronted with a couple of spirits that are not too happy to see a human in their domain. Who will be the unlucky (or lucky) one to look after you?

name: Gangs of the Magic Realm
description: You’ve been running a cafe as a barista for a few years now. Your parents are long since deceased and your younger brother went missing a few years back. As a side gig, you also help sweep the magical ash that falls as “Gray Rain” in your world – remnants of magic from the other side, the Illusory Realm. Weak magi don’t use their magic efficiently, creating a byproduct that pollutes the Mundane World. The No-Contact Treaty prevents these two worlds from interacting and that’s fine by you. The Illusory Realm is run by magi…and everyone knows magi are a lawless bunch.

name: My Elemental Prince: Remake
description: A spirited adventure of destiny and love await you!

name: My Charming Butlers
description: Your uneventful city life is taking its toll—until a chance encounter leaves you as the proprietress of Calico Manor. Within this historic building are centuries of untold secrets waiting to be discovered, along with a trio of butlers sworn to help you… Although it doesn't take long to realize the true mystery lies within your heart...

name: Beastly Desires
description: Your humdrum days are interrupted when you and your sister wake up with strange tattoos. Three handsome beastmen appear and reveal that you hold the secret power needed to coronate a king in the Dark World. But before you can react, a villainous demon kidnaps your sister, vowing to come back for you next!

name: Be My Match
description: You're a successful businesswoman, confident in many areas of your life. But when it comes to dating, love is a battlefield... Or so you thought. What happens when you instantly match on a mysterious new dating app with three insatiable CEO bachelors? Swipe right to find out in Be My Match!

name: Attack of the Dead
description: The world’s never been the same since the zombie outbreak occurred. Your average life turned into an endless fight for survival. But you became strong - So strong that the people around you call you “Lioness.” You managed to make a living as a soldier in a small community of survivors and your latest mission is to secure a supply of food. But things go south and the zombies attack! Just when you think you’re a goner, a mysterious figure wielding two knives takes out all of the zombies in front of you…

name: Mythical Hearts
description: Life hits rock-bottom when you lose your job and apartment in one day! But after a series of events lead you to three handsome, mystical strangers, it almost seems like fate. You're shocked to discover these aren't ordinary guys -- they're a griffin, phoenix, and unicorn in disguise, and they need your help!

name: Awakening of the Eclipse
description: There's a legend in the town where you grew up - "the vampire sealed for five hundred years will be awoken when the Sun blinks and the Earth moves." Of course, it’s just a story…

name: Armed and Gelatinous: Arcade Edition
description:
Armed and Gelatinous: Arcade Edition is a fast-paced competitive multiplayer space-shooter that pits friends against one another in epic battles of blob warfare! Load up on firepower and blast your opponents by sticking weapons to your gelatinous body. But beware that your blob grows larger with each weapon collected making you an easy target for fully-charged Dash Attacks!

Two 4-Player team-based sports modes add some serious replay value to the mix! Trade off playing goalie and striker in Blob Soccer or really put your dash-tackling skills to the test in Blob Blitz! Additionally parties of 4 in Battle Mode can select 2v2 Team Tussle, which turns off friendly fire and combines player scores!

name: Ocha no Ma Battle
description:
Ocha no ma Battle is a collection of a lot of mini games (use a screwdriver, imitate the fighter movements, climb trees with a monkey, dive to grab treasures, run a race, stop before a cliff, etc.) that can be played for one or two players at the same time.

The game features 16 different characters for the player to choose from, 2 games modes (vs and single mode) and a record mode in which the player can check each mini game record.

The game was released in a special box features 4 special controllers

name: It's a Dog's Love
description: You expect your new job at Heaven, a famous pet store in Tokyo, will be pretty straightforward -- until you discover your handsome co-workers are actually half-dogs with the ability to transform at will! Dobe, Shephe, and Bernar entrust their secret to you, and you soon find family in the pack at Heaven… but not all is peaceful. When a rival pet shop sends thugs to destroy the store, you’re forced to stand your ground and defend your new home alongside your friends.

name: The Chains of Enchantment
description: You were living a peaceful life with your father, Glen, and your rebellious younger brother, Dean. But all of that is destroyed when you’re attacked by a beautiful, but evil witch known as Ramza! Just when you thought it was the end of the line for you, two handsome agents named Spencer and Bradley come to your rescue! They say they were sent here by the Magical Crime Bureau to protect you and before you have a chance to ask more, you’re taken to Bradley’s mansion!

name: Starlit Promises
description: Ever since your best friend’s parents died, she’s been struggling with her mental health. While visiting her in the hospital, she gives you a strange crystal as you discuss the arrival of the Centennial Comet, an event that only occurs every one hundred years. That night you awaken from a strange dream with one command left in your mind, “Seek the Crystal of Ananke!” What could it mean? Before you go back to sleep, you get a call that your best friend is missing. While searching for her, you encounter a strange yet handsome man, Orion. He demands answers from you that you don’t have, but disappears when two attractive strangers show up. They want answers too.

name: The Swords of First Light
description: You’ve spent your whole life helping your foster parents out at their inn. You’ve finally received word that you’ll be accepted into a special program in the Knight’s Order of First Light, known for their fighting prowess against demons.
