They even managed to seal Lucifer, the king of demons, away nearly 300 years ago! You work very hard to make yourself useful in the never-ending war against Lucifer’s creatures.

name: Moonlight Wishes
description: You are a woman who moved to the bustling city to work for a printing company. At first, you thought living in a big city would make you happy, but it turns out that your job is just clerical and repetitive — not a great designer like you dreamt of!

name: Lethal Engagements
description: Your life seemed pretty average. Just your average college student enjoying life. But that all changes when two handsome strangers move in next to you. Something about the two of them seems dangerous… You pass it off as just your imagination and decide to go on with life. One night, though, you witness a murder and from then on, your life is turned completely upside down!

name: In Between Love & Death
description:
From your childhood at the orphanage all through adulthood, you’ve known nothing but suffering in a life of poverty and unfairness.
But things took a drastic turn when an unfortunate accident befalls you just when your life is crumbling into pieces.

name: Fateful Forces
description: After discovering that you have supernatural abilities, you are recruited by a secret division of the police and team up with a handsome group of superhuman investigators to thwart the schemes of a mysterious vigilante organization.

name: Dances with Destiny
description: You are a young woman struggling to maintain her family archives and working part-time at a local market. On the night of your debut into society as an adult, you attend the Ball of Indigo Flowers. While there, you encounter a mysterious man who sweeps you off your feet and charms you with his good manners. He disappears before you can talk to him more. Suddenly a man drags you onto the dance floor, and you realize he’s your childhood friend, believed to have died in a war between humans and ghouls. Shocked and overwhelmed, you decide to attend a party at his mansion the following night. Once again, you encounter the mysterious man who noticed your scent, and his enigmatic but handsome brother. While out on the patio, you’re suddenly attacked by a man with glowing red eyes...a ghoul! Your childhood friend saves you, but you find yourself drawn into the world of ghouls, learning more about them and the war. Three handsome men with their own personalities and opinions accompany you, each one vying for your attention. But questions and danger plague you. What is this power you have that quells a ghoul’s violent rage? Who is the person trying to kill you? And who will finally claim your heart?

name: My Mystic Dragons
description: A barista and aspiring writer, you lead a simple, quiet life with your kind grandfather as your only real family. The only unusual thing about you is the strange dragon-shaped birthmark you’ve always had on your back.

name: Kiss of Darkness
description: You’re an officer on the police force who’s been assigned to investigate a series of murders involving women having all of their life sucked out of them. It’s almost as if they were victims of an incubus’ powers. You’re puzzled by these murders, but your partner George seems to know something about what’s going on…

name: Nocturne of Nightmares
description: One day after falling into a deep sleep, you wake up terrified in a dark, creepy world. But you’re not alone. You find yourself trapped in this nightmare world along with a few attractive strangers. Yet, they all seem vaguely familiar. Who are these guys? And why does your heart hurt so badly when you look at them, especially Licht?

name: Demigods of Destiny
description: Your life as a college student seemed normal… But one day, you’re visited by a mysterious woman in your dreams who tells you that you have powers that could change the world. You try to brush it off as just a dream, but things get real when you’re attacked by a man that controls fire!

name: Prestigious Passions
description: After years of studying, you managed to get into the renowned Leonidas University. You selected this school knowing the prestige would help you secure a solid career in business after graduation. Just as important, the university has a club even better than a sorority – it’s home to the esteemed Versailles Executive Club! With the connections you’ll be able to make, you’re sure you’ll be able to land a very lucrative career…or will you?

name: The Pet Doctor's Secret
description: Life in college was pretty normal until one day, your cat gets sick and you have to take it to the nearby animal hospital. They’re not able to figure out what’s wrong, but they recommend you take your cat to the hospital that’s rumored to be able to cure anything. Two extremely handsome doctors and an energetic receptionist seem to be the only staff, but miraculously, they’re able to help your cat in no time! You decide to take up a part-time job at the hospital, but there’s just one rule… Never peak into the operating room while they’re at work!

name: Steal my Heart
description: You are a young woman who works at a museum, and the daughter of a philanthropic archaeologist who went missing several years ago on an expedition to find some legendary magic jewels. These jewels were said to contain a mysterious power that could grant the person who finds them any wish, and your father was dedicated to find the truth. One night while closing up the museum, a strange guest enters and mentions your father. But you soon feel threatened by this intriguing yet terrifying stranger, and in the nick of time, a mysterious, handsome young man appears and whisks you away "to safety..." Later, you find yourself in a secret hideout surrounded by three attractive men, including your rescuer, who are determined to protect you, and find the same jewels your father was looking for! Could they hold the key to the whereabouts of your father, and the secrets of his research? How do they know him, and what do they know about the jewels? Also, who is the strange figure who broke into the museum? What secrets do these people know? And why do they all want YOU? In one single, eventful day, you soon find yourself thrust into a brand new world of secrets, magic, mystery, and the hidden world of the legendary Phantom Thieves. These thieves have long been known to steal various artifacts... but which one will be able to steal your heart?

name: Destined Memories
description: During a performance in your hometown, an unexpected guest creates a stir. That same night you are unexpectedly attacked by soldiers of the Empire…

name: Kiss of the Wendigo
description: One afternoon, you visit the local park with your best friend, who has some exciting news to share. Eager to celebrate, she runs home, while you take your time, enjoying the fresh air and feeling happy for her. But then, you hear a terrible shriek... Disaster unfolds as you soon find yourself at the center of a supernatural murder mystery... and it seems you're next on the list! Despite wanting to avoid conflict, you soon find yourself in the company of three handsome guys who all claim they want to protect you... and all seem to have some sort of connection to the case.

name: The Fate of Wonderland
description: You’ve always had a fascination with Alice in Wonderland. Ever since you were a child, you’ve imagined yourself as Alice venturing through the bizarre and enchanting scenery that is Wonderland. But as you grew older, you realized that those were nothing more than fantasies…

name: Making the Perfect Wedding
description: You are a strong, independent woman who plans weddings for the rich and famous.You love your job, except for the fact that male clients are constantly flirting with you. Uncomfortable encounters with men have left you skeptical about the idea of romance. One day, you receive a request from your ailing sister: “I want to see your wedding.” You have no intention of falling in love, but you also want to make your sister happy…

name: The House of Grudge
description: Every night, you’re haunted by a disturbing dream… You’re in an old mansion confronted by an old woman whose face becomes more and more twisted as she talks to you. Finally, she attacks you and you wake from the nightmare. You try to talk to your friend Trevor about it, but he isn’t convinced it’s anything to worry about. Meanwhile, you continue to be haunted by the dream every night…

name: Freshman Fantasies
description: You've finally made it to college and you're all set to live the life you've always dreamed of! But you have a little too much fun at your first party and it seems like your life is over... Luckily, four handsome boys are here to save the day! Joey, your childhood friend, Ben, the popular football player, Alex, the rich guy and Nate, the lead of a popular band! Who will you choose to spend your college years with? It's up to you to decide!

name: The Spellbinding Kiss
description: You are a young woman who works at a pharmacy passed down by your father. As you head back home on the afternoon of the yearly town festival, day suddenly turns to night and a raging storm begins. You rush to close up shop when you hear a loud noise. Coming towards you is a man covered in blood.

name: Electronic Emotions!
description: You have loved working with electronics ever since you were a young girl, and finding work at an electronics manufacturing company seemed like the natural choice. However, your sales begin to fall and you worry about the stability of your career... until your boss invites you to join a new project. The project is secretive and requires you to pack up your belongings and move to a new address. You are suspicious at first but excited at the possibility of a promotion. When you open the door to the house, you are greeted by three handsome men! At first you are distracted by their impossibly good looks, but soon realize that their actions are far from normal…

name: Gossip School
description: Play as a young woman who finds herself befriending three young celebrities who just want to live normal school lives…

name: University of the Dead
description: You're a research student at university looking to find the cure for a mysterious disease. Life seemed pretty normal on campus with your friends Lucas, Martin and Brian. But one night, when you stay late working on your research, you hear a scream. You go to see what's going on... only to find a monster eating a student! You manage to escape, but you decide to get to the bottom of this mystery with your 3 friends. As you dive deeper, you learn of a secret that will change the world forever. Could this be the beginning of a zombie apocalypse...?

name: Immortal Heart
description: A town bustles with news of a young woman’s abduction. Having lost your younger brother two years previous and sensing a connection, you begin to search for leads. You find yourself at the doorstep of a man named Vis, who has been said to have information on anything that you could ever want to know. Vis agrees to tell you about your missing brother, but only for a price… that is impossible for you to pay. Vis extends to you an offer: “Take this luggage and get on the train that I tell you to.”

name: Seduced by the Mafia
description: You are a fearless reporter who risks her life to write articles covering Italy’s most notori-ous Mafia group, the Cosa Nostra. A past that you would rather forget leaves you with a grudge for the mafia, and you will do anything as long as it connects to the next big scoop, bringing you one step closer to destroying them.

name: Business Affairs
description: For several years you’ve been so focused on work at a toy production company, you haven’t dated in forever! You’re in-line for a big promotion, when you get wrongly accused of spying for a rival company! Your boss gives you a second chance working on a huge project so you can redeem yourself and prove your innocence. You put your all into it, along with three seriously hot co-workers, all vying for your attention!

name: Sinful Roses
description: Even as a young girl, you’ve been able to see the demons that ordinary people can’t. Your parents abandoned you. You were taken in by an orphanage run by the church, where you met a kind man. He became your foster father and you began to live with him in the countryside.

name: Angelic Kisses
description: Five years ago, you lost your parents in a car accident, but you were miraculously saved. You don’t remember the accident very well, but you know that there had been someone there that had helped you all those years ago. You found a bracelet that day. Each day, you live in hope that you can meet the owner of the bracelet, the one that you believe saved your life.

name: Heart of the Fox
description: You are an amateur photographer who loves to take pictures of animals. You often spend hours scrolling through a profile that features photos of foxes. One day, the photos are tagged with the location of a specific mountain range.

name: A Kiss from Death
description:
You are given new eyes to see the world again… but not everything is as it seems.

You take on the role of the heroine and experience a romance with grim reapers!

name: Loyalty for Love
description: You are an independent young woman who runs a homely, old-fashioned bakery together with your grandmother. Your peaceful life is shattered when a few suspicious customers show up at the bakery: three handsome men dressed in black.

name: Twilight School
description: You live in a world where zombies, vampires, and werewolves exist. Humans call these creatures “Demi.” From a young age, humans are taught to fear the Demi, embracing the belief that they are murderers.

name: AI Love My Waifu
description: As an ordinary student, you become entranced by Otoha Hikawa, the school's stunning beauty, who conceals a hidden sadistic side. With your stepsister Mami's unwavering support, you set out on a quest to earn Otoha's favor, embarking on an exciting five-step plan filled with unexpected twists, mystery, and the promise of romance. Can you overcome Otoha's dominant nature and win her heart?

name: Fatal Yandere Love Triangle
description: You're living an ordinary high school life, and one day, you're confessed to by three girls around the same time. As it turns out, all three of them, who seemed normal at first glance, all hold feelings for you that go beyond simple fondness. From blackmail to signing a contract, you're pressured into dating each one, and are now trying to make sure none of these girls find out about the others. You can't do this for forever, though—you're going to have to choose someone sooner or later. And what will become of the girls who aren't chosen? Well, you'll soon find out...

name: Bully Me More
description: Surviving high school is hard enough without a self-proclaimed dictator turning even a walk down the hallway into something from a violent nature documentary. You may not be the only one to suffer under her reign of terror, but this sadistic bully does seem to single you out for more than your fair share when the mood takes her—which is always!

name: L'automne
description: L'automne is a kinetic, linear narrative story. Summer's gone. The Leaves have fallen. Welcome to Alder Falls.

name: Gears of War 2: All Fronts Collection
description: This content pack features all 19 downloadable Gears 2 multiplayer maps and a bonus deleted single-player chapter, "Road to Ruin," from the Gears of War 2 campaign. For multiplayer fans, this pack brings together the complete set of Gears 2 multiplayer maps: Allfathers Garden, Canals, Courtyard, Flood, Fuel Depot, Fuel Station, Gold Rush, Gridlock, Grind Yard, Highway, Mansion, Memorial, Nowhere, Sanctuary, Subway, Tyro Station, Under Hill, War Machine, and Way Station—everything in the Flashback, Combustible, Snowblind, and Dark Corners downloadable packs combined

name: Funny Business
description:
Wow! It's your first day at your new job at the Funny Business joke factory. Over the course of a short corporate induction, you too can become a comedy genius!!

Of course, who knows more about comedy (and the teaching thereof) than junior manager Stone Jones~

name: Mobile Light Force
description: Mobile Light Force is a sloppy localization of the first Gunbird for PlayStation originally released in 1994. This localization removed all plot-related elements including cutscenes and endings, took the in-game's fan art gallery and renamed some characters with names taken from XS Games employees. The game's cover art and title screen also feature a completely unrelated artwork featuring characters resembling the main trio from Charlie's Angels. This realistic artwork is the complete opposite of the anime-styled aesthetics of Gunbird, and the characters displayed don't appear anywhere in the actual game.

name: I’m a Magical Girl’s Pet?!
description: One night you hear an explosion outside your bedroom window and decide to investigate. You stumble upon two girls who appear to be filming a fight scene, only to discover it's a real magical battle! You recognize one of the girls and impulsively jump in to protect her, only to be left in critical condition after being struck by powerful magic. In order to save your life, you’ve been transformed into a little, fluffy animal. Now, to reclaim your human form, you must assist your new magical friends in their quest against evil—as a familiar!

name: Suddenly My Stepsister!?
description: Our protagonist has done his best to try and gain the attention of the school’s most popular girl, but in the process, he’s broken the heart of a classmate that he deemed as 'boring.' However, when his mother remarries, he now has an incredibly cute stepsister who turns out to be that boring girl he wasn’t interested in! Why is she hiding her true identity?

name: My Strange Plane is a Thing Body Moves Through
description: Walk among weird objects in a weird place and hear them talk (maybe) about life

name: The Devil's Soul Inside Me
description: In the thriving Towa City, you, an average high school student with a love for spicy food and fantasy games, are about to unravel a staggering truth… Believing yourself to be human, you're haunted by gruesome dreams of your past life as the Demon King Caacrinolaas. As you grapple with your newfound identity, torn between your chivalrous nature and the dark power within, the fate of two worlds hangs in the balance. Can you resist the call of your former existence, choosing the path of a normal human, or will you succumb to your inner demons, ushering in a New Age of darkness and chaos?

name: Sudden Death
description: A game by Benny Barassi and Geelong Catgirl with additional help by Mother Goose. No pads, no helmets, no gameplay.

name: Kuon no Kanata
description: Sin descripción

name: Barn Runner 2: The Ejection Rejection
description: This game showcases the Top Down Scrolling Arcade engine that powers some of the arcade sequences for Barn Runner: The Forever Friday in the style of Spy Hunter.

name: Barn Runner: The Mayor's New Dress
description:
Mayor Marguerite DuChamp gets her turn in the spotlight (in more ways than one) in this Barn Runner take on the fairy tale The Emperor's New Clothes.

This game stars the mayor of Arc 19 and her best gal pal, The Chief. It's done in a visual novel style with four possible endings in all. It was made for the July 2012 MAGS (Monthly Adventure Game Studio) contest.

name: Barn Runner: Christmas Soup
description: This short game set in the Barn Runner universe showcases the domestic holiday adventures of Noriko and The Chief as they try to get everything ready in time for Christmas.

name: Saving the Axolotl
description:
2D action/adventure platformer game with an Ecological theme.

"Saving the Axolotl" is not just a game; it is an emotional adventure that immerses the player in "Cincuenta’s" constant struggle to protect his home. Throughout the gameplay, the game combines moments of action with pauses to invite the player to consider the impact of human actions on the environment.

The central theme of the game is perseverance in the face of adversity. Despite overwhelming challenges, "Cincuenta" never gives up, symbolizing nature's resilience and its ability to bounce back if given a chance.

"Saving the Axolotl" is a game that takes the player on an emotional journey, highlighting the importance of protecting our planet and its creatures.

name: Catamyst
description: Catamyst is an Action, Roguelike game where you craft and throw molecular potions at hordes of enemies.

name: Paravox
description: Paravox is a high action 3v3 PvP third-person shooter.

name: Bugs
description: Strategically place, upgrade and sell your turrets to prevent the bugs crossing to the other side.

name: Gatos Contra el Mundo
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 12
description:
Bring new thrills and tactics to your Voyages with Sea of Thieves Season 12's audacious assortment of weapons and tools, all available to deploy from April 30th, 2024!

Sea of Thieves Season 12 adds two new weapons in Double-Barrel Flintlock Pistol and Throwing Knives. The Double-Barrel Flintlock Pistol, as the name suggests, can fire two bullets in either rapid succession or both at the same time. It is said to be designed for more close-range combat. Throwing Knives, meanwhile, are very versatile as they have three ways to attack. You can either use them to do a melee stab, which can be charged or uncharged, as well as for a range-throwing attack.

Sea of Thieves Season 12 is confirmed to add several new tools to the game, so here is the list of everything that will be added:

- Scattershot: A new type of ammunition that fires four small cannonballs in a short range but widespread.
- Bone Caller: A new throwable that can spawn three skeletons that’ll aid you in battle.
- Wind Caller: A shell that can, as the name suggests, call wind. It can be used to speed your ships, blow the timber out of your foes, prevent fall damage, and so much more.

Besides these tools, there will be two neat QoL additions:
- Ziplines: New ziplines will be added across the map.
- Harpoon line travel: The rope that you create with your harpoon can now be walked, but beware, you’ll have to balance or you’ll fall off.

name: Supercan 2
description: Süpercan 2 is an action/adventure game that takes place after Süpercan 1. The game developed by Sobee was launched for the first time at GameX 2012.

name: MonTowers: Legend of Summoners
description: Combine monsters to create powerful and beautiful creations! Engage in fevered battles with powerful enemies! Collect over 600 different monsters into your personal army!

name: Source Multiplayer Pack
description:
In 2005, the retail release of Counter-Strike: Source included Half-Life 2: Deathmatch and Day of Defeat: Source as bonus games.

In 2010, Steam released a digital version of the same bundle as Source Multiplayer Pack.

name: The Tunnels of Saint Mercy Road
description: The Tunnels of Saint Mercy Road is an immersive horror experience that spans 4 areas, each unique and provides a different sense of unease. Inspired by games such as Silent Hill, Outlast, Resident Evil and many other (possibly surprising) games and stories, you will uncover the truth behind the urban legends of the tunnels under Saint Mercy Road.

name: L'Abbaye des Morts
description: L’Abbaye des Morts is a game originally created by Locomalito and Gryzor87 and released in September 2010. More than 10 years later, the game has finally been ported to the NES/Famicom by Parisoft Games.

name: Zector 7
description: Fight zombies with your friends in this survival open-world sci-fi. Harvest, Craft, Build, and purchase better gear and vehicles to survive the night. Explore and loot abandoned bases, crashed ships, caves, alien temples, and outposts to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Platinum Demo: Final Fantasy XV
description: Platinum Demo: Final Fantasy XV whisks players away to a fragmented dreamscape, introducing an original story with a few unique twists. Join young Noctis and his magical guide as you explore the fantastical world of his dreams.

name: Starimu
description: Starimu is a virtual world where you can express yourself and explore hundreds of unique styles. Not that only! But imagine a world where you can meet hundreds of people around the globe just by using your device! Get creative, play games, Join Events and have the best time all in one place.

name: Castlevania ReVamped
description: A reimagining of the first Castlevania game as a metroidvania, taking elements and inspiration from all official tellings of Simon Belmont's first encounter with Dracula.

name: Intellivision Lives!
description:
A hefty emulation and multimedia package.

Intellivision Lives! contains nearly every Intellivision game originally published by Mattel Electronics and INTV Corp. (minus, of course, licensed games.) There are several unpublished prototype games included, as well. The hyper-text multimedia presentation includes detailed histories, instructions, and trivia for virtually every game - screen shots, box covers, marketing data - interviews, videos, commercials, etc.

name: Yashiyu No Hyper Ultra Action DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Intellivision Lives!
description: Sin descripción

name: Simulayu
description: Sin descripción

name: O Enigma da Esfinge
description: In this game, you control the hero of the adventure: Gus, an irreverent boy that goes back in time and ends up in Ancient Egypt. In the midst of his misadventures, Gus finds out that the Sphinx is a time machine that allows him to travel back home. But just like him, other people want to use the Sphinx's time-traveling power for their own purposes. Gus must face many hardships and solve challenging puzzles to uncover the Sphinx's Engima and return to the present.

name: HRT Simulator 2023
description: A very sincere and heartfelt shitpost about a guy doing his first shot of HRT.

name: Tails Gets Trolled
description: Tails Gets Trolled is a mod based off of an ongoing webcomic of the same name created by Lazerbot. Originally released in 2011, it's based off mainly the franchise "Sonic the Hedgehog" but also has characters from a lot more series, most notably Super Mario Bros, Looney Tunes, and Tom & Jerry.

name: Professor Quackerton in: The Locked Birdhouse
description:
In this storybook game, Professor Quackerton and her friends have to band together in the wake of a loss. Experience this colorful world of queer animals with big personalities and a big problem.

When a dear friend passes, there is little to be done but to celebrate her life. Trouble is, everything seems to be going wrong. The twins are fighting, the cat is sleeping, and Max won't leave his post... What's a duck to do?

name: We Are Only Moving Towards Each Other
description: A concrete poem in the browser, a love story, and a dream sequence traversed through closing and opening windows.

name: Distance and Mirage
description:
Laurel disappeared when the two of you were just stupid kids, playing out past your curfew. The thing at the molten heart of the desert?

It knows something.

name: Otaku's Adventure: The World Just Keeps Turning
description:
Will the earth be destroyed soon?
Will you choose only one between the earth and Waifu?
This DLC, player will travel through time and space via a time machine, meet all kinds of different people, find clues and growth, and find ways to save Waifu and the earth.
This DLC content is a continuation of the Waifu's story of the main game.
Complete the entire story of the Waifu.

name: Pokemomcore
description: Travel through Pallet Town and Viridian Town after an anti-capitalist and anti-speciesist revolution! Red, Blue, Green and Yellow have fought to emancipate Kanto from the grip of the Pokémon League and its alienating power over the people. And you, you play as GAMIN Lesli who has to pick up a package for their MOM so she can make pottery this weekend with her friends! Will you arrive in time to get the package and will there be any rhubarb pie left?

name: Me Mostre Sonhos Doces
description: A short queer story about searching for sweet winter dreams.

name: Goodnight
description: A Twine story where you go to bed. Except your thoughts prevent you from sleeping.

name: Assemblage of Angels
description: Guide a young woman as she visits old friends and gathers what she needs to fulfill her goal: building an angel.

name: A Gang of Weirdos
description:
Worlds in the universe die in a spiritual sense when an apocalyptic scenario occurs and it leaves behind a soul. If the world soul is charged up, it can revive the world and the people that have died; however, the only way to do that is to recover other world souls from other dying worlds.

You play as someone that calls themselves Mx.Gunslinger, who is on a quest to save their dead world by recovering other world souls, meeting weirdos and friends and weird friends along the way.

name: It Doesn't Have to Be Like This
description: You play a gas station clerk working her shift on the day the earth is destroyed.

name: Snails
description: "SNAILS" is a retro-themed 3-D brawler, generated within a primitive aesthetic which is designed to emulate the characteristics of late-90's era PS1 games.

name: Magicafe
description: Follow fledgling magical girl Darcy Dragonfruit as she simply tries to get to work!

name: Meyni
description: Inspired by The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, this is a work of interactive fiction built in Twine. Play in your browser on any device.

name: Momentous Momentum
description: Help Biip reach the end of each course in this hand-crafted precision platformer with no cap on velocity.

name: Kenas-unarpe
description: A puzzle adventure inspired by the legend of the Kenas-unarpe from Ainu folklore.

name: America Rising 2: Legacy of the Enclave
description: A remake/remaster of the 'America Rising - A Tale of the Enclave' mod, America Rising 2 features a 24 quest main storyline, new fully voiced companions, new worldspaces, and more.

name: Reign of the Undead: Revolution
description: Reign of the Undead: Revolution is a modification for Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare based on Reign of the Undead, a wave-based zombie survival mod that was influenced by the original zombie modes of Call of Duty World at War, Black Ops and newer ones. Different waves require different strategies and teamplay is a must.

name: Star Wars Mod: Galactic Warfare
description: Star Wars Mod: Galactic Warfare is a modification for Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare. It is a total conversion that combines lot of the known battlegrounds, characters and weapons of Star Wars with the gameplay of the Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare multiplayer.

name: Call of Duty 4: Survival Mode
description: Call of Duty 4: Survival Mode is a modification for Call of Duty 4 singleplayer that aims to bring Modern Warfare 3 Survival Mode mechanics to Call of Duty 4.

name: World at War: Nazi Zombies Remastered
description: This mod is a "remastered patch" for the Call of Duty: World at War stock zombie maps. The aim of this project is to modify these maps with bug fixes, quality-of-life tweaks, fixed inconsistencies, new features inspired by Black Ops 1, and a few creative additions such as adding back cut content or storyline-related Easter Eggs.

name: Mysteries of the Heart: The Psychic Detective Case Files
description: This is a mystery/suspense ADV, so you must use your detective skills to solve puzzles and crimes. It employs a 'voices of the heart' system where you can tell what a character is thinking. You'll have to collect clues to solve the crimes, which quickly escalating from simple theft.

name: Cards and Towers
description: Cards and Towers is a unique blend of card games, tower defense and roguelikes. Craft your own unique deck, protect your base tower, slay hordes of enemies, and survive as long as possible. Are you ready?

name: The Distortion Beast
description:
In sleepy Coppersfield, a remote village on the coast of the Axelands, Maria of Cardo is offered a job. Coppersfield has been plagued by terrible attacks from an insidious and monstrous creature they call The Distortion Beast. The village elders want Maria of Cardo to explore the beat's lair, find it, and destroy it once and for all.

As Maria of Cardo, can you make the right choices, and truly defeat The Distortion Beast?

--

The Distortion Beast is an interactive fiction comic. Become Maria of Cardo, an adventurer who dives into the Lair of the Distortion Beast to rid the Axelands of this menace once and for all. Collect items, make choices, and try to defeat the beast!

name: Eyes
description:
Escape the EYES lab, while They are watching.

I need to tell you something.Yesterday, when I was out walking, someone approached me.Looked me in the EYES and blinked at me.He closed his left eye, then left.Didn't even say a word.I have never met this man in my life.I don't understand what happened.And I don't know why it happened either.

name: Lords of the Fallen: Master of Fate Update
description:
VERSION 1.5 - 'Master of Fate': This update represents the culmination of 30+ post-launch updates resulting in significantly improved performance, stability & optimization, alongside rigorous difficulty balancing, and also includes our 'Advanced Game Modifier System', allowing ALL players to fully customize and adjust difficulty of future play-throughs.

The Master of Fate Update concludes now concludes the Free Content Roadmap for Lords of the Fallen, adding the following content and quality-of-life enhancements, vastly improving the experience for all players:

- Significant performance, optimization and stability improvements
- Rigorous difficulty balancing including mob density reduction & nerfed ranged attacks
- Split PvP and PvE game balancing
- Online multiplayer enhancements for improved matchmaking and connection stability
- New questlines including Season of the Bleak, Trial of the Three Spirits, and Way of the Bucket
- New armor and weapon sets
- Additional secret boss weapon abilities
- Improved boss encounters with additional movesets & new AI
- 12 new spells including the arena-devastating Immolation
- New grievous strikes: each weapon family now features two unique finishers: one for single-handed wielding and another for two-handed wielding
- 3 new projectiles: Blood Vomit, Explosive Mines, and Frost Worms.
- QOL updates including: inventory expansion, appearance reset, storage functionality & gamepad rebinding

name: Valor
description: Sin descripción

name: JimmyQuest
description:
It is a morning unlike any other, for today Hajime "Jimmy" Lara is going to do something she has never(?) done before — take a big CHOMP out of Junta's tail!

Hajime "Jimmy" Lara and Junta are two beautiful cats who live together in a little house with two weird humans. But who cares about humans? Jimmy has her eyes on one target, and it's that enticing, twitchy, wriggly-wiggly tail sprouting out of Junta's butt.

The story will involve a brief introduction to Ms. Jimmy and Mr. Junta before she spends her hours honing her skills to pull off the perfect crime.

Bolster her STEALTH, ROUMB, CUTE, and BITE stats to ensure that she achieves her almighty goal!

And if you win...long live Queen Jim!

name: Jim and Dill: The Legend of Weed N' Stiff
description: Join the adventure! Jim Weed and Dill Stiff have been kidnapped by the jealous Joe Bobson, leader of the rival band Moo Cow. You’ll have to battle your way through the seaside, mountains, caves, and snow to save the Weed N’ Stiff boys! Along the way, a cast of characters from the Weed N’ Stiff universe will help you on your quest. Sort of. At least there’s a lot of WS references and even some of the band’s music in glorious 8-bit.

name: Dicy Chess
description:
Experience the full feeling of playing chess...
BUT WITH RANDOMNESS
At the start of each turn you roll a dice and the outcome determines how far you can move

name: Lover
description: Lover is a short visual novel about being hunted by a beast in the woods. It can be played in under an hour.

name: Let's Go To The Circus
description:
Lets Go To The Circus is a short and rather silly horror comedy game.

A mysterious attack at a circus has you curious as to what caused it, can you uncover the mystery behind this attack?

name: Lands of Languages
description:
Lands of Languages (LoL) is a hobby project developed with the objective of learning language vocabulary in a fun way. Learning requires repetition, which is often boring. So here the repetition is embedded within the grinding tasks of a role-playing game, and the development is heavily focused on gameplay.

In LoL you explore a procedurally generated world inhabited by different beings, which you can capture and train in battles. These battles are the core gameplay, and your battle success depends on solving translation challenges. As your beings level up, you gradually encounter harder challenges and can explore new areas of the world.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
description: Like a lost NES release from 1993, Adventures in Gameland is a fully fleshed NES version of the new upcoming Rugrats game. This is included within the standard release and also as a standalone cartridge for your retro console.

name: Resist Resist Resist
description: Sin descripción

name: Whispers
description:
Guess the spy while networking at a retro game launch in 2124!

Whispers is a short interactive story about networking in the video games industry and the experiences of marginalized developers at work. Set in a retro horror game made in 2124, this is an early prototype featuring two characters and several endings.

name: Hustle Quest: Historia of Urth
description:
We play games to escape from the harsh mundanities of life. In Hustle Quest you do the exact opposite. Hustle Quest is a comedy RPG with a heavy focus on dialogue and exploration as opposed to combat.

When a Cat Girl named Mia drinks too much on her birthday, she ends up selling a powerful magical artifact needed to defend the town against an oncoming threat. Worse, the person she sold the artifact to wants to take over the town. Now Mia must recover the artifact before it's too late! But first, she has some errands to run.

Explore a town filled with unique quests, multiple secrets and memorable characters. Make choices that determine how quests play out and your overall chance of success against the final boss. Discover what happens when a Cat Girl drinks too much.

name: Macaroni in a Pot
description:
Experience the thrilling world of PRO PASTA COOKING!

Learn the secret techniques behind making mediocre Mac'n'Cheese from the comfort of your own computation device!

name: The Reshaping of Googol 1B: The Tower
description: The Reshaping of Googol 1B: The Tower, is the second game in the "The Secret of Googol" edutainment series. "The Secret of Googol" is a game series by the San Diego-based company Lightspan Inc (aka Lightspan Adventures).

name: Comuni Non Comuni
description:
Choose the real Italian Municipality between the two options provided. Very easy!

Comuni Non Comuni is a simple, fast, immediate and engaging game. You will be shown two names: one is a real Italian municipality, the other is a name generated with an ad hoc algorithm.

name: Witch
description:
Help the witch to enter her house in this short puzzle-adventure side-scroller.

Created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

name: Hemophobia
description:
A visual novel about friendship, body image, and blood.

The world humans live in is not their own. One hundred years ago, vampires revealed themselves to humanity and conquered every nation on earth. Now, to keep them from wiping out the rest of us, every able-bodied person must donate a pint of blood once weekly to keep their hunger at bay. It's worked pretty well, so far. Humans do their thing, and vampires do theirs. Most people can forget what they're doing.

But what if you can't give blood at all?

name: Lost Everything: Chapter 1
description: Embark on an immersive adventure with "Lost Everything: Chapter 1," a captivating 2D point and click game. Join Billy, the determined protagonist, as he delves into a journey of revelation, where the truth awaits, whether he's ready for it or not. Unravel mysteries, solve intriguing puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets in this compelling storyline.

name: We Are Stardust
description: Space Invaders. Wrapped in a circle. And Mavis Beacon playing it.

name: Gunbird
description:
Marion and friends battle hard in the sprawling world
of yet another Psikyo shooter masterpiece.
Now with online rankings!

name: Mortal Kombat II
description:
Mortal Kombat II is an unlicensed port of Mortal Kombat made by Hummer Team. Both Kart Fighter and AV Bishoujo Senshi Girl Fighting, which were released later, use an earlier version of this game's engine.
Despite the title, this game is actually a port of the first Mortal Kombat. This was likely done as a form of selling the product as a sequel, a common trait with unlicensed NES games. While the game is mostly faithful to the original game graphics-wise, some features were cut from the game. These include fatalities and blood which are found only in Mortal Kombat II Special. Also Goro is the same size as the other characters, probably due to the NES's limitations.

name: Uwol 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Hanzala Returns
description: You play as Hanzala, a 10 year old Palestinian kid who just wants to go to his home and avoid getting captured or killed by the occupation forces.

name: Nutty
description: Sin descripción

name: Hydrangea
description: Hydrangea is a romance and psychological horror visual novel inspired by the Hanahaki disease trope. You play as someone whose sweetheart, customizable to your preferences, falls ill with a mysterious condition just as you reconsider ending the relationship. Drawn closer by their plight, you find yourself navigating a love that deepens into obsession, where affection takes a dark turn and the petals of devotion threaten to suffocate.

name: Winglet
description: A short 10 minute flying game.

name: Super Uwol
description: Sin descripción

name: Flower Shop of Broken Wonders
description: A short interactive fiction game about taking a look at a local run-down flower shop.

name: Ultimate FPS Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Strange Journey 2
description: A fan-made sequel to Atlus' cult classic, made in Ren'py and predominantly featuring generative AI assets.

name: NFL 2K Playmakers
description: NFL 2K Playmakers is a mobile game featuring hundreds of cards to collect. Amass NFL players to construct the strongest rosters for offense, defense, and special teams. Level up your collection through gameplay and add equipment that will take your cards to the next level. Fill out your Playbook by collecting play cards that give you the perfect play to call for the victory.

name: Kemonomichi Girlish Square
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Numan Athletics
description:
Four superhumans compete!
8 incredible competitions! !

name: Someone to Hold Me
description: A very short, simple visual novel made in a week, starring an asexual girl and her internal and social tribulations. Featuring one ending, an unlockable epilogue, and a few post-game secrets.

name: Clay Jam
description: Save the land of Clay Jam from the fearsome Bully Beasts in this fun-packed action game. Guide Fat Pebble as he rolls down five weird and wonderful hills in a world made entirely from clay! Squash monsters on the way, and he'll grow and grow and GROW! Get all the way to the bottom of the hill and meet the nasty Bully Beasts. Can you collect enough clay to free the monsters and save Clay Jam?!

name: A Tavern at Night
description: Sin descripción

name: A Tavern at Night: Firelight
description: Sin descripción

name: Mori no Naku Shunkan he: The End of a Saga
description: Mori no Naku Shunkan he: The End of a Saga is a "parody"/fangame of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Adventure
description:
An evil magician has stolen the Enchanted Chalice and has hidden it somewhere in the Kingdom. The object of the game is to rescue the Enchanted Chalice and place it inside the Golden Castle where it belongs.

This is no easy task, as the Evil Magician has created three Dragons to hinder you in your quest for the Golden Chalice. There is Yorgle, Grundle and Rhindle.

There are 3 castles in the Kingdoom: the White Castle, the Black Castle and the Golden Castle. Each castle has a gate over the entrance. The Gate cas be opened with the corresponding colored Key. Inside of each Castle are rooms (or dungeons), depending at which Skill Level you are playing.

The Castles are seperated by rooms, pathways and labyrinths.

name: LvL50
description: Complete 50 levels. In a row. Without getting hit.

name: 3D Mersi
description: 3D Mersi is a Block Out clone, published as a type-in listing in the October/November 1991 issue of CPC Amstrad International.

name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
description: The PC version adds 5 exclusive characters, being Ryo Hazuki, Football Manager, Shogun, General Winter and Willemus.

name: Ninja Cats
description:
Monsters have invaded Cat Planet!
Grow your ninja cats and keep the peace in the cat world.

Collect cute neon cats and unique skins.

Enjoy spectacular battles with the weapons and skills of ninjas with attributes.

name: Ninja World Adventure
description: Protect your village by using your powers and explore the outside world !

name: The Twins: Ninja War Legends
description: An adventurous journey of the true great twins from a mysterious village that has a thousand year history of fighting monsters.

name: Ninja Shadow: Shall we Date?
description:
Enter the world of the Edo period--

Be a brave Ninja Otome--

name: Papo Town Fairy Princess
description: Fairy Princess is a new wonderland theme play house game presented by Papo World. This pretend play game gives you a unique interactive experience!

name: Dungeon Princess 2
description: Command a princess, and her subjects, as they head towards the deepest parts of a Dungeon. Rogue-like type real-time turn-based action RPG game.

name: My Sweet Home Dungeon
description:
Who Dares to Disturb the Peace of Dungeon?
The Great Battle to Protect the Dungeon Begins Now!

name: Raid the Dungeon
description: Raid the Dungeon is an easy tapping clicker RPG game with a backgroud of exotic fantasy world and an epic adventure.

name: EOS RED
description: 《EOS RED》the Deadliest MMORPG. No more drawing gears, all gears can loot from the field! Bounty system to make sure your enemies never get away that easy.

name: Serious Sam: Portals
description:
Features:
- 3 maps connected through a central hub
- 30 secrets including 3 special secret rooms
- supports single player and co-op
- supports all difficulty levels

name: Minecraft: Kung Fu Panda
description: Unleash your inner AWESOMENESS with the DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda DLC! Master kung fu alongside Po and the Furious Five at the Jade Palace. Kick, punch, and skadoosh your way through this adventure map filled with action-packed battles, epic showdowns from the movies, and a multiplayer mode for pand-tastic fun!

name: Minecraft: Universal Studios Experience
description: Let’s go to Universal Studios, right here in Minecraft! You’ll start your adventure at the gates of Universal Studios, where Woody Woodpecker will greet you and ask for your help restoring the letters on the Universal globe. As you venture forward, you’ll encounter riveting rides, souvenir shops, amazing minigames, and more marvelous characters like Shrek and E.T.

name: Papo Town: World
description: Welcome to Papo Town World! With all your favorite apps like Papo Town Hospital, Papo Town Castle, Papo Town Apartment combined together, this is a perfect game to play house with friends, create your own life stories and explore different places and scenes to connect with your real life. Play and learn in Papo Town World!

name: Tota Life: Parent-kid Suite
description: Welcome to Tota Life: Parent-kid Suite. Do you commute between school and home all day and have no time for a vacation? Here, you can decide how to spend your vacation, even for a short weekend! You can get the most leisurely time, don't forget to invite your family and friends, come to the island parent-child suite!

name: Tizi Town: My Hotel Games
description:
Best hotel games for kids. Play Tizi Town hotel games and experience 5-star luxury at its finest.
Welcome to Tizi Hotel. Our 5-star hotel is the best in town and a dream hotel for family vacations, travel, and more.
Check-in at the hotel reception where our lovely receptionist will greet you with a warm smile and enthusiasm. Enjoy some delicious snacks and drinks at the cafeteria across the reception while we prepare your room.

name: My Cat Town
description: Are you a cat lover? Have you always wanted a cat as a pet? Then this game will beyour best companion. Come & explore the cat playhouse. Cuddle, pet & play with them all day long.

name: My Hospital Town
description: Do you know the superhero that wears a white cape? Yes, you are right those are our doctors! Ever dreamt of saving someone's life? Then Tizi Town Hospital is the right place that gives you the joy of role-playing a doctor and saving your people's life.

name: My Tizi Town: Grandparents Home
description: Fun pretend play app with exciting kids' games where they can bond with their grandparents and have loads of fun and family time.

name: Jibi Land: Princess Castle
description: Jibi Land Princess Castle is a pretend-play dollhouse game that features an open-ended style of play. This allows you to explore a world filled with magic and fantasy. In this magical land, you will find numerous surprises and meet amazing characters such as little princesses, charming princes, dragons, unicorns, fairy, and many other cute pets. If you are a fan of dollhouses, this is a game you won't want to miss.

name: Jibi Land: Princess Town
description: Jibi Land : Princess Town is the new world for the Jibi Land pretend play dollhouse game, where we present a farming world for you to play in with an open-ended style of play.

name: My Pretend Summer Waterpark
description: Do you love going to the Waterpark with Family and Friends? Then you will LOVE My Pretend Waterpark - Kids Summer Splash Pad with Friends and Family! Go swimming at this fun Water Theme Park with family and friends!

name: Tizi Town: Doll Dress Up Games
description: Play the best dress up games and dress up chibi dolls and sweet girls in beautiful costumes. Become a fashion icon in the avatar world by donning stunning outfits on adorable chibi dolls and magic princesses in our dressing games. You will go aha when you create stories with Tizi Doll world.

name: My Tizi Town: Daycare
description: Do you like cute little babies? Do you think you can handle the adorable toddlers? Then this app is perfect to test your baby caring skills. Take care of kinder and preschool-aged kids in the Tizi Town - Daycare. Feed them, play with them, give them baths, and more, in this fun kids game!

name: Tizi Town: Room Design
description: Do you enjoy decorating rooms and designing houses? Then Tizi Room Design and House Game is the perfect home decor world for you. Create avatars, build a house, craft life story, design floor and decor rooms with the interiror design skills you got. Create life stories and play home design games in this world of avatars. You can decorate kitchen, school, living room, bedroom, dressing rooms, pink room and different themed rooms and be an interior designer. Create home decor that will make you go Aha! Explore a variety of fun and imaginative rooms, such as the enchanting Ice Castle, the cuddly Teddy Bear Room, the vibrant Yellow Greenery, the playful Pink Preschool, the magical Unicorn Bedroom, and so much more. The choice is yours!

name: Minecraft: Armored Paws
description: Minecraft: Armored Paws is a minor update for Minecraft: Java Edition which adds content voted for at Minecraft Live 2023 by adding armadillos and wolf armor, while also adding 8 new wolf variants.

name: Minecraft: Armored Paws
description: Minecraft: Armored Paws is a minor update for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition which adds content voted for at Minecraft Live 2023 by adding armadillos and wolf armor, while also adding 8 new wolf variants.

name: Tizi Airport
description: Presenting Tizi Airport, a fun airplane games kids will enjoy and fall in love with flying. Begin your journey across the globe and experience the joy of flying anytime and anywhere in Tizi airplane games for kids.

name: Emma's World
description: You’re invited Home with Emma to play with her and all of her family and friends in her gigantic world - Emma’s World, a fun, imaginative Dollhouse game filled with interactive homes, shops, schools, hospitals, and many rooms to explore!

name: Princess Amelia's World
description: Welcome to Princess Amelia's World, a magical fairytale land where adventure and creativity reign supreme! In this enchanting app, children can immerse themselves in the captivating world of castles, princesses, and endless possibilities.

name: My Pretend Halloween Town
description: Do you love my pretend preschool, pretend hospital, and pretend airport? Do you love pretend games, and playing with characters in various scenes and cities?

name: My Pretend Family
description: Come home and play with us in my Pretend Home & Family in a fun, imaginative Dollhouse filled with interactive rooms to explore!

name: My Pretend Fairytale Land
description:
Explore over 8 Venues Total including the Castle Entry! Find the key, and enter the Castle to explore more rooms!

My Pretend Fairytale includes a Ballroom, Gardens, Kids Bedroom, the Royal Family Suite, Kitchen, Rooftop Garden with Fireworks, and Swimming Pool!

Check out all areas, and find the secret rooftop area and watch a huge display of fireworks!

name: Papo City Builder
description: Welcome to Papo City Builder! Use your imagination and creativity to build your dream Utopia. Do you want to live in a city, a town, a village or a forest? Build your world with a blueprint or at your will. Let’s get started!

name: Papo Town: Hospital
description: Do you want to be a doctor? Start your internship at the Papo Town Hospital! Work as a doctor to treat the town residents! Do you know how to operate an x-ray machine? How about doing a dental check for Colin the Cat, or work as in the emergency center to cure the patients? Explore in the hospital and become an excellent doctor!

name: Purple Pink Summer Beach
description:
Beach Dressup!
Help Purple Pink select a cute outfit for the vacation! A swimsuit? Or a red dress? Don’t forget to match some accessories like a nice straw hat and a pair of sunglasses!

name: Papo Town: Travel
description: Who wants to travel all over the world with Purple Pink the Bunny? Papo Town: Travel will make your dreams come true! There are so many destinations to choose from! Which is your favorite place? The beautiful seaside of Aegean Ocean, the mysterious rain forest, the exotic Egypt or the South Pole? Let’s pack up your suitcase and head to the airport!

name: Slime Evolution
description: Raise cute little slime and take care of a slime farm of your own!

name: Papo Town: Skyscraper
description: Papo Town now has the highest building! Before moving into the apartments, the residents of Papo Town need your help! As an interior design, everyone in town loves your brilliant décor ideas! So get creative! Use your talent to decorate and design the apartments!

name: Papo Town: Forest Friends
description: Purple Pink the Bunny moves to her new home in the forest. This forest is full of wonders and fantasies, and best of all, lots of new friends! Would you like to visit the new friends with Purple Pink? Let’s go！

name: Papo Town: School
description: Papo Town series are simulated role-playing games presented by Papo World.

name: Papo World Cleaning Day
description:
Have you ever offered a hand to your parents in house chores?
After a party with friends, the house is a mess. Help Purple Pink the Bunny to organize and clean up all rooms.

name: Papo Town School Life
description: What’s the school life like in Papo Town? Come and join the Papo Town friends to find out! Play and learn in classroom, playground, art room, laboratory and music room! Enjoy the exploration in each scene and find the hidden surprises!

name: Papo Town Clinic
description: Papo Town Clinic needs your help! With patients coming in constantly, we are short in hands! Start to work as an intern and help cure the town residents! Besides, the clinic is lacking wards and rooms to accept more patients. So we have to work harder and earn more coins to expand the clinic into a hospital building! Do you want to accept this challenge? Let’s go!

name: Papo Town Happy Kingdom
description:
The Happy Kingdom Amusement Park in Papo Town is always full of laughter and happiness. Yet these days it was filled with darkness! Purple Pink the Bunny got a HELP letter from the circus of the amusement park, saying that some of her best friends were locked up and forced to perform in the circus. Purple decided to explore in the park and find out the dark secrets of the circus owner!
This is a great puzzle game and play house game for your little ones! Search and explore in each and every scene of the amusement park, find the hidden clues, resolve the puzzles, and rescue the Papo friends!

name: Purple Pink Chinese Food
description: With the success of the Japanese restaurant, Purple Pink opened a Chinese Restaurant! Customers in the Papo World will order their favorite food, and you will assist Purple to prepare the dishes for them!

name: Papo City: Hospital
description: Welcome to Papo City: Hospital! – A unique blend of innovative city building and house role-playing game, where you can design and place your own hospital city map and enter the built rooms to play as doctors and patients, simulating hospital scenes and stories! In Papo City: Hospital, you can also interact with real-life friends, like and compete in your designs!

name: Papo World Playground
description: The library in Papo Town just lost several important books! Could you help Purple Pink find them all? Let’s start from the biggest playground in town!

name: Papo Town: Mall
description:
Welcome to Papo Town! Here you could create the story of your own!
Have a shopping spree! Enjoy the fun of exploration and discovery! Craving for an ice cream? Hey make one by yourself! Feeling like changing dress style? Enter the clothes shop to try on everything! There are more to experience!

name: Papo Town Magic World
description: The owl just dropped you a mail! Open it! What? It’s Purple Pink asking for help! She accidentally petrified her friends and really needs your help to find the cure and lift the curse! Take your wand and enter the magic world! Explore a whole new world with magical things and supernatural creatures! Live the life of a wizard or a witch!

name: Papo Town Pet Life
description:
Who doesn’t want a fluffy and furry animal friend? In Papo Town, You could live with not just one, but many of them! Every pet is unique! Playing with so many cute animals and taking good care of them will bring you infinite fun and happiness!
Adopt your favorite animal in Papo Town: Pet Life. Cats, dogs, horses, parrots and even lizards! You have lots of choices! Take your favorite animal to different scenes and explore the fun!

name: Papo Town: My Home
description: Welcome to Papo Town: My Home! This is a simulated play house game which you could play together with your friends! You are welcome to visit and explore in this sweet home! Play with imagination! No rules!

name: Papo Town Sports Meet
description: What’s like to stand on the top of the stage as a sports champion and receive a gold medal in summer games? The annual Papo Town Sports Meet welcomes your participation! Sign up for the sports you are good at and strive for the gold medals!

name: Papo Town Fire Department
description: Papo Town Fire Department is recruiting! Who wants to be a brave firefighter hero? Together with Purple Pink and other Papo friends, let’s save the town residents trapped in the fire accidents, and protect their lives and property from fire!

name: Papo Town Castle
description: The wicked witch was jealous of the beauty and elegance of the princess. So she cast an evil spell on the princess to make her fall asleep forever. Meanwhile, the prince was trapped in the dungeon and couldn’t come to the rescue. But the prince left some clues, hoping that someone who is intelligent and brave could solve the puzzles to release both the princess and himself.

name: Papo Town Pirate
description: For those who love adventures! Welcome on board little pirates! Join Purple Pink for a great exploration in the aim of finding the mysterious treasure in the sea!

name: Papo Town Apartment
description: The Papo Town apartment has expanded! With four new rooms, we have new neighbors joining us!

name: Papo Town: Underground City
description: This is a play house game that parents and kids will both enjoy! It could enhance kids’ imagination and creativity by simulating different roles! At the same time, their language expression will be improved immensely through the creation of stories!

name: Papo Town Farm
description: Welcome to Papo Town farm! Did you even wonder how grains are grow and how milk is produced? What’s like living in the countryside and stay with the cute farm animals? Papo town farm is the perfect place for kids to get familiar with agricultural production and understand how our daily food comes out, and also get to know the farm animals.

name: Papo Town Fairytales
description: There is a mysterious fairytale world in Papo Town where all the popular fairytale characters live there! Join Purple Pink the Bunny and Steve the Lion to explore in the world of your favorite fairytales!

name: Battle Cats Quest
description: Knock your animal rivals off the edge and become the legendary King of Cats!

name: Papo Town Wedding Party
description: Get ready for the grandest wedding party in Papo Town! This game is a perfect combination of play house game and puzzle game, which will bring you double fun!

name: Papo Town Space Explorer
description: This is for the little scientist and astronauts who loves the stars and the universe! Let’s explore the mysterious universe and the solar system with Purple Pink the Bunny!

name: Papo Town Preschool
description: Papo Town: Preschool simulates the real kindergarten and preschool environment and scenes including classroom, dining room, playground, toy room, school infirmary, activity room, sleeping room and bathroom. It is important for kids to learn how to share toys with friends, have classes together, enjoy outdoor activities and different ways of exploration and discovery!

name: Papo Town Museum
description:
Welcome to Papo Town Museum, where history is fun!
Purple Pink the Bunny will guide you back to different eras and history periods to visit the famous collections all over the world!

There are seven exhibition halls in Papo Town Museum, including the prehistoric creatures hall, stone age hall, ancient civilization, empire and knight, the Renaissance, the great exploration and industrial revolution exhibition hall! Each exhibition hall has collected and displayed the most classical and representative collections of that period and times.

name: Papo Town Pop Star
description: Do you want to be a superstar? As a beginner and nobody in the entertainment business, Purple Pink surely dreams big. She just moves into a new house in Papo Town, and needs to work and train hard to become an A-list celebrity, so she would have enough coins to decorate her new house.

name: Papo Town Build Stories
description: In Papo Town, everyone is a city planner and an architect. You are granted with a large scale of land, where you could build your own dream city freely and start to create your own life stories!

name: Papo Town Seasons
description: Papo World presents this cute educational app for young learners! Do you know the unique characteristics of spring, summer, autumn and winter? Let's play and learn in four seasons with Purple Pink!

name: Papo Town Spring Festival
description: Welcome the Chinese Lunar New Year in Papo Town! The Spring Festival is the grandest traditional festival of the Chinese people! If you are interested in the activities and traditions of this festival, come and join us in Papo Town: Spring Festival!

name: The Icky Mr Fox
description: A beautifully illustrated, funny, animated interactive story for children.

name: Missing Friend: Icky Mr Fox
description: Come along with Mr. Rabbit on an adventure to rescue his dear friend from the mischievous Icky Mr. Fox in this interactive book app. Explore beautiful and interesting scenery, learn new vocabulary and interact with quirky characters.

name: Have You Heard
description: A comical tale and memory game of barnyard whispers as told by comedian Rhys Darby (Flight of the Conchords, Yes Man, The Boat That Rocked). For kids of all ages.

name: Magic Math
description: iHuman Magic Math helps young children grasp mathematical concepts through fun, interactive, and age-appropriate content. Our multifaceted and child-centered system builds a variety of fundamental mathematical thinking skills, including number awareness, shape awareness, comparing and sorting objects, space and position, and simple reasoning.

name: Bonzo The Brave: Be Brave
description: Sin descripción

name: Papo Town: Sweet Home
description: Welcome to Papo Town! It is up to you to create the rules of life here! We will visit the sweet home of Purple Pink the Bunny. Enjoy the fun of exploration and discovery!

name: Papo Town: Baby Nursery
description: Welcome to Papo Town: Baby Nursery! This is a newly upgraded kindergarten where everyone can freely create, explore, and learn with joy. You could play house and pretend to be any role you like: a teacher, a nurse or a cook and take care of our adorable babies, just like in a real kindergarten! Play and interact with cute little friends without any rules, fostering imagination and enhancing cognitive abilities in an interactive environment. Experience the joyful activities of a kindergarten and look forward to the real preschool life!

name: Papo World Dinosaur Island
description: Purple Pink the Bunny loves dinosaurs more than anything. One day she found a mystery dinosaur island! Would you like to join Purple and take a tour on the island? The most exciting thing is that you could seek for dinosaur eggs! There are many eggs hidden in the island. You could find them all and hatch the eggs. Given love and patience, the baby dinos will soon break the shells and meet with us!

name: Papo Town History Discovery China
description: With more than 5000 years of civilization and history, China has written one miracle after another in human history and left countless artistic treasures. We are about to explore the museum of China to admire tons of valuable and precious national treasures which unveil the marvelous history of China.

name: Purple Pink Math
description: Have fun learning and practicing math with Purple Pink! This app will help your preschoolers build foundational math skills and practice mathematical thinking, both at home and in school. Not only could your little ones learn about numbers and shapes, easy laws of math, but also discover the fun of math in real lives.

name: Papo Learn & Play
description: Especially designed for early learning and entertainment, this is a massive collection of games, cartoons, songs, pictured books and brain training puzzles. It helps the preschoolers to master essential life skills and build emotional intelligence through role play. Your little ones will enjoy the free exploration and the fun of learning.

name: Papo Town Dessert Shop
description: Papo Town Bakery is open today! Are you ready to taste lots of delicious desserts? Macaroons, cupcakes, donuts, fruit pies, cream cakes and ice creams... You’ll learn how to cook these beautiful and yummy desserts, and also satisfy your customers’ needs. With the coins you earned, decorate the diners upstairs! There are so many furniture for your choice. Where to place them, how to decorate the room, it's entirely up to you! Enjoy the fourfold fun of cooking, restaurant management and, house design and play house!

name: Papo Town Food Street
description: Welcome to Papo Town Food Street! Here, you can experience a variety of distinctive delicacies. Walking down the bustling streets, you'll meet different buddies and together enter the food shops of your choice. Experience the making of delicacies, create your favorite dishes, and enjoy the food with friends. Come and explore your culinary journey!

name: Papo Town Restaurant
description: Welcome to Papo Town restaurant! Make a variety of dishes, design and create a unique restaurant! This is the perfect place where you could learn to cook all kinds of food from all over the world, from delicious European food to exquisite Japanese food, and also the Chinese food! The best of all, you get to taste all of them! Explore in 7 different rooms and scenes as you wish!

name: Papo Town: Hospital Story
description: Missing cases are reported every day in Papo Town, which caused panic among the residents. Surprisingly, rumor has it that the hospital of Purple Pink the Bunny is involved in the missing cases. Purple and her working pals in hospital are in huge crisis! The police couldn’t help much, so they decided to investigate these cases by themselves. Can you help them reveal the truth and catch the criminals?

name: Papo Town Happy Festival
description: This is the festival house in Papo Town! Enter different rooms to experience and enjoy each and every important festival with your Papo Town friends Purple Pink the Bunny and Steve the Lion!

name: Papo Town: Ocean Park
description: Welcome to Papo Town Ocean Park! This is a perfect place for summer vacation! How about making a huge sand castle? Lying on the beach and have a cold drink? Or a beach barbecue party! The stars in the ocean park prepares a splendid show for you, too!

name: Purple Pink Coloring Book
description: Attention please, little artists! Purple Pink the Bunny has the most incredible coloring book! Lots of pictures, tons of colors and tools! Create your painting artwork!

name: Papo Town Countries
description: How many national flags can you recognize? Which is your favorite country all over the world? If you travel to your favorite country, what kind of cultural activities and local food would you like to enjoy? It’s not safe to travel abroad because of the COVID-19 pandemic, so Papo Town features this new theme room decoration and play house game.

name: Purple Pink English
description: Papo World released the latest English learning app! Designed exclusively for 2 to 8 year olds, this app could help kids learn English in the most efficient way, with interesting game play, and start with their most familiar food!

name: Purple Pink Game Box
description: Are you looking for an electronic toy for your toddler and kids? Purple Pink Game Box is the perfect app! With 40 mini games ranging from daily life facts like weather, housework, cooking and washing routines to basic knowledge like weather, shapes, colors and numbers, your toddler will benefit a lot from this educational app!

name: Papo Town Spaceship
description: Space crisis! The most notorious fugitives in space are acting recklessly! Purple Pink and other space policemen need your help! As the caption and commanding officer of Papo Town Spaceship, you should lead your super fleet to fight with the criminals, defeat them and maintain the peace and stability of the universe!

name: Purple Pink Jobs Mix
description: What’s your kid’s dream job? An artist, a scientist, a teacher or an astronaut? Through this matching game, kids could learn about different jobs in a playful way!

name: Attack of the Earthlings Mobile
description:
Attack of the Earthlings, the humorous alien strategy game for PC and Consoles, is being reimagined for the mobile platform and has landed on mobiles everywhere.

Command the Swarmers, a highly adaptable and dangerous alien species, against the comically unethical Galactoil Corporation that have invaded your planet for its resources. Survive against the human invaders for as long as possible to prevent the annihilation of your species in this turn-based wave defence.

name: Swiper's Big Adventure
description: Baby Fox lost his way and Swiper has volunteered to take him home. With help from Dora, Boots, and you, Swiper will fulfill his kind quest. But you'll have to be very careful because crows, spiders and bats are around and they will try to slow him down.

name: Marathon: Durandal
description: The remastered port of Marathon 2 for Xbox Live Arcade by Freeverse. Featuring new HD sprites and textures; with a toggle to switch to retro graphics, revised HUD, 16:9 Widescreen, 60 FPS and Achievements with support for 4 players local split-screen and 8 players over Xbox Live.

name: Falrika the Alchemist
description: Falrika the Alchemist is an 173,000-word interactive fantasy novel by Benedict Villariaza. It’s entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Gothic Remake Collector's Edition
description:
Gothic Remake Collector's Edition includes:

- Gothic Remake
- 34x24cm Sleeper wall mask
- Genuine leather wristband
- Genuine leather notebook
- Original soundtrack

name: Dig VR
description:
DIG VR captures the sheer joy, adrenaline and frustrations of life on a digger in an exciting experience for novices and pros. Featuring authentic, immersive controls that recreate the feeling of driving a real digger, DIG VR is a light-simulation game with a casual arcade-twist!

Grow your business in the charming town of Diglington, a place where everything can be fixed by the power of a digger. Take on a variety of jobs for the town's residents - from traditional construction jobs, to more obscure requests! Accompanying you is DIG FM, a dedicated radio station with a wide selection of music to brighten any day.

Progress from micro-sized to colossal diggers, with a diverse set of attachments to overcome any challenge. Dig in style by unlocking over 70 customization options to suit your aesthetic!

Available to play solo or with a friend, get hands on with the fast-paced mini-games or unwind in the sandbox mode. Then, discover a trove of Lost Treasure in a standalone mode where new items are added regularly.

Whether this is your first time operating a digger or you’re already a master, digging fortunes await!

name: Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai: Milky no Yabou
description: A "beautiful girl mahjong" game from the Suchie-Pai series.

name: Sengoku Gensokyo
description: Being a parody beetwen the Rance and Touhou series, the story sets the player as Hakurei Reimu into a situation where Gensoukyou has been divided up into various warring states. The ever mischievous Yakumo Yukari, the culprit behind the start of this war game, has sent out letters to all of the major factions of the world laying out the rules of the game and promising to grant one wish for the winning team.

name: Aelfric the Wondrous
description: A short kinetic novel made by LadyMeowsith.

name: Quetzal
description: Quetzal is a free online gaming platform that allows Twitch streamers to host live quizzes with their viewers without the need for them to leave the stream. Participants can simply respond in the chat to be automatically counted as players, without requiring any additional connection.

name: Trapped Inside a Train (And There's Nothing You Can Do About It)
description:
You're stuck inside a train. There's got to be something you can do to get out, right?

(A short, nonsensical experimental game. Featuring several endings, including a 'true' one unlocked by seeing all the others, snark, and a train.)

name: SoulCalibur III: Arcade Edition
description: Soulcalibur III: Arcade Edition is a reworked version of Soulcalibur III with all glitches found in the console version fixed and the overall balance of many moves revamped. Amy, Hwang and Li Long are also official characters with Amy getting a new outfit for the second player.

name: Ken Griffey Jr. Presents Major League Baseball
description: Sin descripción

name: NHL 95
description: Game Boy port of NHL 95.

name: NHL 96
description: Cancelled Sega Game Gear port of NHL 96.

name: NHL 96
description: Game Boy port of NHL 96.

name: NHL Hockey 2000
description: Game Boy Color port of NHL 2000.

name: Capcom Mystery Adventure Double Pack
description: A bundle containing both "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy" and "Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective".

name: Olympic Summer Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Of Slimes and Sandwiches
description:
Of Slime and Sandwiches was a collaborative project made over several discord calls with friends.

The plot, characters, artwork and other aspects were all decided on the spot during those calls, and the result was this: a masterpiece for the ages.

name: Puchi Carat
description: Sin descripción

name: Jak the Chicken
description: Adds over 18 levels and 900+ collectibles to the game and new powerups and adventures!

name: Rime
description:
You stumble across an old book and get trapped within its world.
Solve all of its mysteries, and escape the world of the book.

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold - Streets of Gotham: Full Throttle
description:
Hit the streets or take to the air in the Gotham Grand Prix!
Now you can fly along with Gotham City's wildest rides!
Win to unlock more bonus features.
Come in first on the driving levels and watch a special video associated with each track!
Come in first on any one of the flying tracks and take flight in the Batjet!

name: Proto Bat-Bot: Battle for Gotham City
description:
Get a chance to use one of Dark Knight’s most powerful inventions in this action packed game! Drive the Bat Bot and save the city in Proto Bat Bot: Battle for Gotham City! Take on the criminals of Gotham City in 3D action!

Proto Bat Bot: Battle for Gotham City is an action-packed adventure game where you get the opportunity to use the Bat-Bot. In this game, Batman’s robotic defenders went astray. Now it’s up to you to control the Proto Bat-Bot, customize it as you see fit, equip various weapons, and go on hunting. Change the weapon selection to adapt to your playstyle and save the Gotham City once again as the metal Dark Knight! Good luck and have fun!

name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?
description: Players take on the role of gumshoe and explore the globe tracking down crafty criminals through guided tours of various locales and beautifully painted 360-degree panoramas. The player must use their knowledge to find Carmen Sandiego or any of her innumerable henchmen, all with the help of a searchable database within the game that contains: video clips; essays on each area's economics, politics and culture; maps; and photographs.

name: RamsaySnap
description: A game about shooting characters for points but you need to avoid killing the wrong people. Instead of SnapShot characters you will be aiming real people but avoid the SnapShot characters at all costs.

name: Saint Seiya: Exclamation
description: Saint Seiya: Exclamation is a Brazilian RPG fangame with characters in the SD (Super Deformed) style. The story continues in an original way with the series, but with the addition of two new characters: Yusei from Vulpecula and Aki from Apus! The new characters were introduced so that the game follows a new line and is not too predictable for the player! When starting the game you can choose between Male (Yusei) and Female (Aki), each of which has exclusive stories in the game!

name: Saint Seiya: Caos Chapter
description: Saint Seiya: Chaos Chapter created by Yuri Fernandes is a Brazilian Knights of the Zodiacs fangame divided into chapters where the world is in Chaos and it is up to the golden knights to restore peace to the world.

name: Les Chevaliers du Zodiaque: Il Faut Sauver Athena
description: Les Chevaliers du Zodiaque - Il faut sauver Athena are a french fangame of Knights of Zodiac made for Loulou Martoni.

name: Sonic Boom: A Dating Sonamy Sim?!
description:
Sonic Boom A Dating Sonamy Sim?! or SBDSS, is a bite-size visual novel fan-game made to attempt to tackle an idea I've always had lurking (menacingly) in the back of my mind: "What if there was a sonamy dating sim?"

Following the events of Sonic Boom S2 EP. 44 : Sonic the newly appointed delivery boy is led to a house along the water's edge. Greeted by a familiar face with... intentions, he plays along.
